name: Premo! Sculpey & Accents 2 oz
description: We are very excited to now stock a full range of Premo! Premo Sculpey is an artist’s dream come true! After conditioning, this clay is soft enough to blend easily but firm enough to hold fine detail so is perfect for specialised techniques. It’s ideal for caning, mokume gane and mica shift. Because Premo retains flexibility, the finished product remains very strong and durable. This unique characteristic makes it our most durable clay, ideal for jewellery, home décor and functional items we use every day. Premo comes in 24 densely saturated colours and can be mixed to create custom colours. Based on an artist’s palette the colours, intense on their own, can also be blended for custom creations. This combination of strength and beauty is easily transferred to any project you have in mind. Whether creating millefiori beads and canes, delicate scrapbook pages, faux semi-precious stones or glass adornments, Premo Sculpey is the clay to use. The same great polymer clay as Premo! Sculpey® but the enhanced clays in the Premo! Accents line allows for making exciting and unique projects using an artist’s palette. The complete line of Premo! Accents has 24 rich colours: 4 pearlised colours that are great for creating faux semi-precious stones, 6 metallics containing tiny mica particles to create a reflective effect, 6 translucents to lighten clays and provide a transparent effect, 2 granites containing elements that give the appearance of natural stones and 5 glitters for creating projects with a glittery, sparkly finish. Download the full colour chart here. Bake at 275 °F (130 °C) for 30 minutes per 1/4 in (6 mm) thickness. DO NOT MICROWAVE. Baking should be completed by an adult. DO NOT EXCEED THE ABOVE TEMPERATURE OR RECOMMENDED BAKING TIME.

options.name: Premo! Accents Bright Green Pearl PE02 5035
Premo! Accents Frost White Glitter PE02 5057

name: New Resin Roses - Many Colours
description:
Very lovely resin roses measuring 16x4 mm.

We have these in several colours, and a random selection of 10 roses mostly in different colours will be sent - but if you prefer to pick your own colours, just let us know!  Simply email us at mail@jasminstudio.com and if we have your choice available, we will be happy to supply it.  

Pop these onto rings, hair clips and earrings - the choice is endless.

options.name: I will email you my choice!

name: Little Leaf Bails - Silver Plated
description:
A great addition to our range of bails, these little guys are quite similar to our popular small bails in terms of size and quality - these are simply a smidgen wider at the pad and squarer at the opening.  And they have a slightly ridged, leafy shape. 

They measure 16mm long x 7mm wide (overall), the pad is 7x9mm and the ring opening is 3x4mm.

Sold in packs of 10 pcs, currently available in Silver Plated finish (lead and nickel free).

name: Shallow 20mm Pendant/Charm Trays - Silver or Bronze
description:
Lovely shallow trays with a smooth bezel edge about 1.5mm deep, these trays measure 20mm in diameter internally, and have a flat ring so that you can either hang them from a bracelet, keyring or with a jump ring they will make great pendants.

We have tried them with our 20mm hollow glass bowls and they look fantastic!  We will certainly be making more of those.

These trays are available in silver plated finish or antique bronze, and as with all our metal jewellery components, they are also lead and nickel free.

The trays are sold in packs of 10 pieces.

name: Top Quality 14mm Bezel Cufflinks
description:
Brand new cufflinks, beautiful all round.  These are our best bezel cufflinks, we are sure you will not find a better quality.  They are a lovely weight and feel good and sturdy, with a beautiful smooth finish.  

If you make cufflinks for sale, you can be sure your customers will love these.  If you make cufflinks for gifts, we can guarantee the lucky recipient will be impressed!

They measure 16x25mm overall, and take a 14mm insert in a 2mm deep bezel.  They are perfect for both our 14mm glass cabochons and our stickers, though you may prefer to put gemstones or other inserts. The cufflinks are made of thick plated brass and are free of nickel and lead.  The walls of the bezel are approximately 1mm thick.

Each cufflink is packed individually to ensure pieces are not damaged in transit so you can be sure you will receive the best quality possible.

Available in silver plated finish, in packs of 1, 5 or 10 pairs, simply pick your option from the drop down list.

name: Little Resin Doves - Many Colours!
description:
Cute little resin flying doves measuring 13x20 mm.

We have these in several colours, and a random selection of 10 doves mostly in different colours will be sent - but if you prefer to pick your own colours, just let us know!  Simply email us at mail@jasminstudio.com and if we have your choice available, we will be happy to supply it.  

Pop these onto rings, hair clips and earrings and see your designs fly! (boom boom!)

options.name: I will email you my choice!

name: European Spring-Back Earrings with 13x18mm Oval Bezel
description:
Love Love Love.  

Lovely quality earring findings for pierced ears, with a sprung back (called a European fitting!) and an oval 13x18mm serrated edge bezel for adding your choice of gemstone or glass cabochon, epoxy sticker, resin or polymer clay. 

Available in value packs of 10 pairs, or individually if you just want to make sure they are right for you, these are currently available in two colours:
- silver plated
- antique bronze

The bezel cup fits our oval 13x18mm glass or stickers perfectly.  These are available on separate listings. Both are equally beautiful.  We can't decide between them.  Will have to have both.

Please note the stickers and glass shown in the photos are for illustration only and not included in this listing.

These earrings are ideal for using with resin, polymer clay, gemstones and glass cabochons. For use with glass cabochons you will require a completely clear glaze to ensure the image shows through clearly under the glass - Glossy Accents, available on a separate listing, is ideal for this. Remember to coat any image well with sealant or decoupage glue before applying the glaze so that the colours do not run. Always test your paper before making up the final piece.

name: Jasmin Studio Crafts Resin Kit
description:
This must be the most long-awaited product in our range - our very own resin! 

A must-have item for the jewellery maker who craves originality in their work, as it will allow you to use images and embed objects into bezels, and can be used in small moulds for making your own cabs.

This is a two-part epoxy resin that dries hard, clear and glossy to a slight dome. It does not have an offensive smell and is a lovely consistency to work with (despite its loveliness, please ensure you use it safely and note the material safety data before use).  It is dry after 24hrs.

In the resin pack you will receive:
100 ml Part A Resin
50 ml Part B Hardener
2 Plastic Mixing Cups
2 Wooden Stirrers
Printed instruction leaflet

To use simply mix 2 parts of Resin (bottle A) with 1 part of Hardener (bottle B) by weight.  **This bit is very important: you must ensure you weigh your two components accurately or the resin may not set properly.**  

We recommend you use a good set of scales - in the drop down list you can purchase some scales that we like to use which allow you to weigh even very small quantities accurately, but if need be they will weigh up to 1000g.  These scales take 2 AAA batteries, not included.

In the drop down list you can also buy additional wooden stirrers, sold in packs of 50.

This resin is manufactured in the UK by RF Bright Ltd. 

MSDS are available.

name: Ring Blanks with 20mm bezel cup - different colours!
description:
New arrival!  An in-between size to the very popular 16mm and 25mm rings, these 20mm lovelies will sit gracefully on your finger with your choice of adornment.  

Available singly or in value packs of 10 for bigger jewellery-making projects, these rings come in two fabulous colours: silver plated and antique bronze.

One adjustable size will fit all except for the smallest of fingers.

These rings are ideal for using with resin, polymer clay, gemstones, glass cabochons and hollow glass domes - see our blog for ideas!

name: Neodymium Rare Earth Magnets Two Sizes, Self Adhesive Option
description:
Incredibly strong Neodymium Rare Earth magnets, available two sizes, two versions and two pack sizes.  These are top quality super-strong magnets.  

We have two sizes, all round magnets: 

- Our medium size magnets measure 10mm across x 2mm high and they can each hold an incredible 1.2kg (over 2.6lbs!).   
- Our small size magnets measure 6mm across x 1mm high and they hold about 0.3kg (just over 1/2 lb).

Both of these sizes are available in two versions, plain or self adhesive.  The self adhesive type come with a strong 3M self-adhesive backing that will stick to most surfaces - to apply, ensure the area they are to be attached to is clean, dry and free from dust.  Peel back the adhesive backing, press hard sticker-side-down onto your chosen surface, and your magnet's ready!

You can choose to buy these magnets in a pack of 10 or a pack of 100 magnets. 

Now for the serious stuff - safety considerations:

    * Strong magnets, especially neodymium magnets should not be given to children
    * Strong Magnets may affect or interfere with sensitive electronic instruments. Always keep magnets at least 100mm from such devices
    * Magnets can destroy information stored on magnetic media such as credit cards, floppy discs and computer hard drives. Keep them at least 50mm away
    * Analogue watches, televisions and computer monitors can be permanently damaged by placing magnets near them
    * Do not use magnets in explosive atmospheres
    * Do not use magnets if you are pregnant
    * Do not use magnets if you use an insulin pump, or have a pacemaker or surgical pins etc. fitted.
    * Use with care if you suffer from Nickel allergy

These magnets are made of Neodymium-Iron-Boron and contain approximately 75% iron which makes them prone to corrosion. A protective coating has been applied to these magnets, effectively a triple coating of Nickel-Copper-Nickel (Ni-Cu-Ni). 

Please note in recent weeks the price of rare earth metals has increased by 100% - we have tried to minimise the impact of this increase by not putting our prices up by the same percentage, however we could not continue to sell them at the same price as before.  We will follow the situation on the cost of these raw materials and if they go down again, we will endeavour to do the same with our prices.

An important note regarding the self-adhesive magnets – if you stick one magnet on a metal surface you will be able to pull it off and stick it back on innumerable times with no great effect to the sticker, however if you stack up your magnets all in a column, the magnetic pull of several magnets together can be too much for the sticker, so just something to remember when you are packaging up your finished magnets – side by side is fine, but if you stack them up, you may find that one little sticker doesn’t stand a chance next to the accumulated strength of several of these already-strong magnets (and this is why they don’t make sticker backed magnets in big sizes, because the magnet would always win over the sticker – nerdy fact of the day courtesy of Jasmin Studio Crafts!).

You can use our magnets with glass tiles or cabochons with your choice of image for a lovely crafty idea or a simple resin cab.  

Your fridge will thank you.

name: Shallow Cufflinks with 16mm Round Cup, Choice of Colours!
description:
NEW! Lovely new cufflink blanks, these are very similar to our standard round cup cufflinks, but shallower, so they are perfect with stickers - easy!

They are made of brass and are nickel and lead free, and are available in silver plated, gold plated, antique bronze, antique silver, vintage copper or glossy gunmetal black.  Please state your choice using the drop down list below (and please note if any options are out of stock they will not appear on the list).  If you opt for the pick'n'mix, please email us your choice of colours at mail@jasminstudio.com.

If you wish to purchase stickers or glass to fit, please look for the 16mm size.  The examples in our images have been made using our 16mm round epoxy stickers - available in the sticker section of the shop.

This is a new product we are trialling so we only have limited quantities - get some before they run out!

These cufflinks are ideal for using with resin, polymer clay, gemstones and glass cabochons.  For use with glass cabochons you will require a completely clear glaze to ensure the image shows through clearly under the glass - our glazes, available on a separate listing, is ideal for this.  Remember to coat any image well with sealant or decoupage glue before applying the glaze so that the colours do not run.  Always test your paper before making up the final piece.  

Please see other listings in our shop for all the items you will need to make these cufflinks and other beautiful jewellery and accessories.  

We offer a low £2.50 flat shipping rate within the UK - buy more and don't spend any more on postage!

name: Resin Birdies
description:
Lovely new resin birds to glue on to your jewellery and accessories.  These birdies measure 12x27mm and are handpainted orange, blue or green over a coloured resin base. They have a flat back to allow you to glue them onto hair pins, ring bases, tags and bails!

Pick between a pack of 5 or 10 birds, in your choice of colours or try a mixed pack.

Tweet, tweet!

name: 10 x Steel Cable Necklets/Chokers for Pendant - Choose Your Colours!
description:
Gorgeous steel cable necklets with screw-in clasp.  A beautiful way to show off your handmade pendants - these sturdy and slim chokers are very sophisticated and will look fantastic with my pendant trays.  They are made of wound steel memory wire covered with black plastic tubing.

They measure 45cm long which is about 18in, and they are 1mm in width.

The width of the unscrewed metal end is about 3mm in diameter, so it will fit most bails (it will not however fit our flower bails or our small silver plated bails as they are tiny!)

This listing is for 10 (ten) necklets in your choice of colours.  

We have:

1 - Black
2 - Gunmetal Grey
3 - Silver Grey
4 - China White
5 - Turquoise

name: Oval Ring Blanks - Two Sizes, Two Colours!
description:
Fab new oval rings blanks with a shallow serrated bezel for your cabs or stickers.

These rings are available in Silver Plated or Antique Bronze, and in a choice of sizes: 13x18mm or 18x25mm.

They are adjustable, but unlike our other rings, the adjustable bit is hidden under the bezel!

Available individually or in packs of 10 rings.

(We apologise but the cabs shown in the pictures are not included!)

name: Crystal Clear Square Glass Tiles 10x10mm
description:
Beautiful new size - these 10mm by 10mm by 4mm flat square glass tiles are the ideal size for so many projects, they would be great as earrings with just an earstud with a pad back, or try making a mini mosaic out of them - measuring 10mm per side, they will fit 3 to a side into our 30mm trays. 

These beautiful glass pieces have a magnifying effect on the images they sit over so your graphics will come alive.

In the images attached we have simply painted the back of the tiles in blue nail polish and glued them into a 30mm tray.  You could try this in different colours or with tiny images behind each glass piece.  Gorgeous!

Available in packs of 10 or 100 tiles.

name: Round Connector Blanks 10mm
description:
Lovely little connector blanks - these take the tiny 10mm glass, stickers or any of your own resin creations.  

They are perfect for making your own bracelets, necklaces and as connectors for long drop earrings.

The internal bezel measures 10mm in diameter, and the external diameter is about 12mm.  The little rings either side measure approximately 2.5mm and are closed.

Available in packs of 10 pieces, currently in silver plated finish.  Please note glass is not included in this sale but is available separately.

Buy more and save with our £2.50 flat postage rate for UK customers!  *(does not apply to international shipping)

name: Beautiful Oval Locket - Silver, Antique Silver or Bronze Plated
description:
Ah, how cute is this little locket? This little antique bronze or silver plated locket measures 34x24mm and has space for a 13x18mm oval glass cabochon or epoxy sticker.  

These lockets are open simply by prising open a little catch and you have room inside for pictures.  You can also decorate the top and add a glass or gemstone cabochon.

The piece is nicely engraved on all sides and polished clean.

The perfect addition to your romantic vintage jewellery ranges!

Available in Silver, Bronze and now also in Antique Silver!

name: Acrylic Square Bracelet 20mm - Silver, Black or Bronze!
description:
We never thought we would be quite so taken aback by an acrylic bracelet, I mean, it is plastic after all...  so why have we all fallen in love with these bracelets?  Well firstly, they don't actually feel like plastic!  They are smooth, polished, shiny, solid, and very very tactile - we dare you to try wearing one without fiddling with it all the time!  Secondly, you have not one but eight (eight!!) opportunities to show off your pretty pictures on eight separate bezels of 20mm each!   And thirdly, it might be the quickest piece of jewellery you will ever make.  True!

And this just in - FOURTHLY!  they now come in black and bronze too!

You can choose to use these bracelets with your own 20mm inserts or use them with our 20mm glass tiles or epoxy stickers which fit perfectly (see pictures showing a silver bracelet with stickers as an example)

**IMPORTANT NOTE Please be aware glass and stickers are no longer included in this listing, but are available separately - simply look for 20mm square tiles in the glass section of our shop, or 20mm square  stickers in our epoxy sticker section.  You will need 8 glass pieces or stickers per bracelet**

The internal bezels measure 20x20mm.

These bracelets are elasticated so will fit most wearers, however they are a tight fit - they were not designed to bounce around your wrist.  If do you find the fit slightly too tight, or if you are making some for sale and so would prefer to have a range of sizes to offer your customers, we would recommend restringing the bezels on elastic stringing material with a tiny bead in between each bezel tray.

We guarantee total love for these bracelets!  A firm favourite.

(image credit to Download - http://www.etsy.com/shop/download)

Secondly, you have not one but eight (eight!!) opportunities to show off your pretty pictures on eight separate bezels of 20mm each! name: Customisable Compact Mirror
description:
Gorgeous pocket mirrors in silver finish ideal for adding your own topping.  These look particularly good with our matching clear resin stickers to personalise your essential handbag item.  

These mirrors measure approximately 60mm (under 2.5 inches) in diameter, and they open to reveal two mirrors inside and they close with a gentle click.  The underside is engraved with a nice pattern.  (please note however that this can differ from batch to batch, and can be either a swirly flower pattern or a more graphic pattern - do ask which one we have in stock if you want to double check).
 
We now supply them in two versions:

- with a rim where the internal bezel measures 50mm in diameter (see pictures), or
- flat at the top, no rim, with a top surface measuring 58mm in diameter (photos coming soon!).  

Both can now be bought without stickers, but if you wish to buy the stickers, these are available in the drop down list below.  58mm stickers will be here shortly.

The epoxy resin stickers we sell fit the mirrors perfectly so that you may customise them as you prefer.  The stickers will attach to most papers without requiring any coating.  However, depending on the type of glue you intend use to stick these to the mirror, you may need to coat your papers to prevent any reaction with the glue.  We have succesfully used both ModPodge and e6000 to glue the customised stickers to the trays.

Mirrors are sold individually, or in packs of 10.

**please note stickers are now supplied separately - see drop-down list**

name: Plain Trays/Cabochon Settings 25mm - Round or Square, Many Colours!
description:
This listing is for 10 plain trays that are incredibly useful when you want to give a nice finish to your glass pieces but you don't necessarily want to make them into a pendant.  

If you have thought of making brooches, fridge magnets or game pieces but were a bit put off by the untidy back of bare paper with glaze, you will know exactly how helpful these little pieces will be!

They are made of lightweight plated brass and they come in a variety of colour finishes:  unplated brass, silver, steel, bronze, aged copper and gold, and have a slight serrated edge.  They measure about 26mm across which means that a 25mm glass cabochon, tile or sticker will fit perfectly. 

Please note the brooch backs, glass and stickers shown in the photos are not included in this listing, but are available separately.  We have brooch backs in matching colours!

We look forward to seeing the myriad creative uses these are put to - make sure you send in your pictures!

Sold in packs of 10, in your choice of colours.

name: New 12mm Ornate Round Pendant Trays
description:
Beautiful new ornate pendant trays to take a round 12mm cabochon - these are such a lovely design we couldn't resist them.  They have a large frame surrounding your 12mm cab in a tidy sunburst pattern, reminiscent of antique styles of jewellery.

We have teamed these up with our own glass cabs, as well as resin ones and they look amazing.  These would pair up beautifully with gemstone cabs - think old gold + lapis lazuli and you know where we're heading with this! Yes, Egypt!

They measure approx 25mm externally, and the bezel is 1mm deep.

Sold in packs of 10 pieces in your choice of antique silver, antique bronze, vintage copper or old gold.

Made of zinc alloy.  Lead and Nickel free.

name: NEW SIZE! Acrylic Medium Oval Bracelet 18x25mm - Silver and Black
description:
We love our acrylic bracelets!  They are smooth, polished, shiny, solid, and very very tactile - we dare you to try wearing one without fiddling with it all the time!  You have nine opportunities to show off your pretty pictures on nine separate bezels measuring 18x25mm each.     

These bracelets are available in black and silver colour.

Both glass and stickers can be used (both available in the shop), but please note glass makes these bracelets a little heavy, and as the bezels go all the way round your wrist, you will have to be careful not to knock and potentially crack the glass on your bracelet.  

To use the stickers, simply place the sticker over your preferred image, cut around it and glue into the bezel using ModPodge or E6000.  

These bracelets are elasticated so will fit most wearers.

We guarantee total love for these bracelets!  A firm favourite.  

**Please note stickers are no longer supplied with this item but they are available separately, look for 18x25mm oval stickers in our epoxy sticker section or cabochons in our oval glass section.  You will need 9 glass pieces or stickers per bracelet**

name: Shrinkles Shrink Plastic
description:
What do you do when you want some funky new designs for your jewellery, maybe in bold colourful patterns, but you just can't find the right piece?  You make it yourself, that's what.  

Here you have an amazing material that will allow you to do just that.  Shrinkles, for those who may not know, is a brand of flexible plastic  that will take your artwork, drawn or printed. By heating this plastic sheet in a standard domestic oven, it will become 7 times smaller and 7 times thicker, definitely thick and strong enough for most jewellery applications but yet light enough for any wear.

Do you fancy making your own illustrated toppings for pad cufflinks or hair clips?  Done.

Do you want to make unique pendants or connectors using your own freehand work?   Yep, that's possible.

We have Shrinkles for drawing and stamping in White, Frosted (which becomes see-through), Black and mixed packs of Pastel Colours (with blue, green, pink and yellow).  We also have them for printing your designs on an inkjet printer.

Really, the possibilities are endless.  

There is a more detailed tutorial on the blog here:

http://jasminstudiocrafts.blogspot.co.uk/2013/05/shrink-plastic-jewellery.html, 

and there will be full instructions on the packaging, but essentially you draw/print your design, bake it in the oven and that's it, it's ready!  Easy peasy.

The varieties we sell are as follows:

1 - Shrink Art Small (6 sheets of 101x131mm) - Frosted Finish
2 - Shrink Art Small (6 sheets of 101x131mm) - White
3 - Shrink Art Small (6 sheets of 101x131mm) - Black
4 - Shrink Art Large (6 sheets of 202x262mm) - Frosted Finish
5 - Shrink Art Large (6 sheets of 202x262mm) - White
6 - Shrink Art Large (6 sheets of 202x262mm) - Black
7 - Shrink Art Large (6 sheets of 202x262mm) - Pastels (Pink/Blue/Yellow/Green)
8 - Shrinkjet Small for Inkjet printers (6 sheets of A6 size) - White
9 - Shrinkjet Large for Inkjet printers (6 sheets of A4 size) - White

Give it a go, you may just love it!

options.name: 8 - Shrinkjet Small for Inkjet printers (6 sheets of A6 size) - White
9 - Shrinkjet Large for Inkjet printers (6 sheets of A4 size) - White

name: Brand New Hollow Glass Domes!  Several Styles and Sizes!
description:
Ahh, the joys of a new product.  We love the raft of new ideas they give us!  These in particular have caused quite a stir here...

Here we have hollow domes and balls.  All are open and ready for you to fill them with your inspired plans.  

We have three distinct types, all sold individually or in packs of 10 pieces:

1 - a half-sphere, similar to a salad bowl.  These come in sizes which refer to the diameter at their widest point 15mm, 20mm and 25mm.  Height is between 10mm and 18mm.

2 - a tall dome, like a small display case, measuring 37x24mm.

2 - an open ball, very much like a fish bowl.  These also come in three sizes (and the number in brackets refers to the size of the opening):  20mm (12mm), 25mm (15mm) and 30mm (21mm).

These domes and bowls are made of glass, but as they are hollow, they are *extremely* fragile - as such we would recommend applying them to pieces that are not likely to receive any knocks and bumps during normal use.  

Because of the method of making this glass (they are blown rather than cast), there may be differences from one piece to another.  Also there may be small inclusions in the glass, and objects seen through the glass may look slightly distorted.  But we think it just adds to their charm.

We will be adding projects to the blog with these items - we have so many ideas for them!  They will look great on ring bezels (gentle use only!!).  The salad bowls will look great on a pendant a tray, and the fishbowls will make fantastic pendants hanging from a button blank lid - see here: http://www.jasminstudiocrafts.com/product/button-blanks-for-glass-or-stickers-12mm-16mm-and-20mm - (please note the 30x21mm fishbowl will not fit into the 20mm trays)

You can fill them with mementos, beads, tiny trinkets or our flavour of the month style: dioramas.  Tiny realistic scenes preserved forever behind glass.  We have been doing some experimenting of our own and have procured a few packs of moss which makes an excellent pretend grass - we are happy to put these limited stock packs of green-green moss for sale here until stocks last!  

We are really keen to see what you make with these.  Post all your pictures on our Facebook page @jasminstudiocrafts!

name: Bow Connectors - Different Colours!
description:
Cute little bow connectors, available in antique silver, antique bronze, old gold or vintage copper.

They measure approximately 20x10mm and have a ring at the top and bottom so you can join them to your favourite chain or beads.

Made of a zinc alloy that is lead and nickel free.  Sold in packs of 10 pieces.

Very nice indeed.

name: Rubber Connectors for Glasses Chains - Black or White
description:
Cute!  Another new item to help you expand your jewellery and accessories range. 

These connectors measure approximately 20mm in length. They are made of rubber so they are reasonably elastic and have a metal ring that will adjust to most frames of glasses.

Simply attach jump or split rings, design your choice of chain and you're off! 

Sold in packs of 10 pieces, either black or white, with a silver tone metal ring.

name: Button Blanks for Glass or Stickers, 12mm, 16mm and 20mm
description:
These are sooo sweet!  Little metal buttons in either silver or antique bronze finish and now we can offer these in three sizes:

- 12mm internally (approx 14mm externally and 1.5mm high),
- 16mm internally (approx 18mm externally and 1.5mm high)
- 20mm internally (approx 22mm externally and 1.5mm high)  

All are perfectly sized to go with our glass and stickers of the same size, or resin and polymer clay if that is more your calling.  Look out for our glass domes coming soon, these will make perfect lids for them!

These buttons have a little 2mm ring at the back so that they can be sewn onto fabric, threaded onto a thin chain or jump ring.

These buttons are available in packs of 10 pieces.

Please note that we do not advise washing any items made with glass, stickers, glazes or resins, so these buttons are intended for garments that will not generally need to be washed, or consider removing the buttons before washing the fabric.

They will be fabulous on doll and bear outfits, sewn onto hairbands,  hats and corsages, bags and stationery.  

We expect these fab buttons will put to many exciting uses - do send in your pictures to our facebook page @jasminstudiocrafts!

name: Crystal Clear Domed Round Glass Cabochons 35mm
description:
Beautiful round clear glass domed cabochons, measuring 35mm  across.

This listing is for a pack of 10 cabs.

These are top quality completely clear glass cabochons, very smooth, shiny and totally see-through.  They a have a magnifying effect on the patterns they sit on so they will make your images jump!  

They have safe rounded edges, making them ideal for pendants, brooches or keyrings.  Just add on a bail or try and make a set of magnets.

Please see other listings in our shop for all the items you will need to make beautiful jewellery and accessories. 

We offer a low £2.50 flat shipping rate within the UK - buy more and don't pay any more in postage!

name: New Ornate Large Oval Trays 30x40mm - Antique Silver or Bronze
description:
A new ornate tray in our range - fabulous 30x40mm oval trays with filigree border, great for all your vintage style makes.

These trays are more elaborate than our standard so whilst you can use alone them as a focal piece, you can also happily pile on the detail, whether with beaded chains or charms aplenty.  They will carry it all beautifully and will not be overshadowed by any amount of adornment.

The border filigree is pierced so you can also dangle beads and charms from these trays.

Made from a zinc alloy that is lead and nickel free, they measure 42x55m overall, with an internal size of 30x40mm.  They are just over 1mm deep, and 3mm thick.  The ring opening is 4mm across.

Our 30x40mm glass and stickers fit beautifully, but please note that they are not included - photos are for illustrative purposes only.

Sold in packs of 10 pieces.

We love them!

name: Brooch Backs in All Colours!
description:
Sweet little brooch backs, perfect for using with any glass tiles and ideally paired with our flat metal backs for a professional finish to your handmade projects.

These little brooch backs measure 20mm long and 5mm wide, so they fit perfectly into the popular 25mm glass pieces.  

Available in Silver Tone, Antique Bronze, Vintage Copper, Gold Tone and Gunmetal Black.

Please see separate listings for glass and metal covers to match these brooch findings.

This listing is for 10 brooch backs.

name: Eyepins and Headpins - Many Colours to Choose From
description:
A very useful item in any jewellery maker's toolkit - brass headpins and eyepins.  

We have chosen to stock a standard length (35mm, just under 1.5in) that is good for all purposes, not too long that you have lots of waste, and not too short that you can't thread on a few beads and bobs.  

It is a nice and solid width, made of 0.7mm wire, that is flexible but will not break easily.  And the platings do not flake off either, unlike some others we have come across!

The flat head on the headpins measures approximately 2mm across.

The eye on the eyepins measures 3-4mm in diameter.

Made of brass wire, all finishes are lead and nickel free.

Sold in packs of approximately 50 pieces.  Please note these items are packed by weight so this quantity may vary slightly.

name: Mod Podge Sampler Pack 5 x 59ml Pots
description:
Can't decide between our Matte and Gloss ModPodge?  Well here is your chance to try both, and another three very hard-to-find types: Outdoor, Sparkle and Paper.

Five little bottles of 59ml each in one handy pack. 

The original Mod Podge formula that’s a glue, sealer and finish all in one! Use this crafting favorite to decoupage almost anything on wood, glass, terra cotta, metal, canvas and more, then seal with a top coat of Mod Podge. Projects dry to a protective matte, gloss or sparkly finish, and one Mod Podge in this pack is even suitable for pieces bound for the great outdoors! 

For or over 40 years, crafters have used Mod Podge® for their most treasured creations. This amazing all-in-one glue, sealer and finish has come along way since its invention in the 1960s and has become a true favorite among crafters of every style and skill level for its versatility, dependability and value. It’s a glue to adhere paper, fabric and other porous materials to almost any surface, it holds tight and dries clear. It’s a sealer that protects decoupage, acrylic paint, stain, fabric and more! It’s a finish that is durable, smooth and fast-drying! Non-toxic with a simple soap and water clean up makes it great for kid's crafts, too.

Use it to coat your graphics, images, photographs and Chiyogami to seal before applying Diamond Glaze, or use it as a top coat to decoupaged wooden tiles. Apply 2 or 3 coats and allow it to dry well between coats. Remember to always test your graphics first!

Please see other listings in our shop for all the items you will need to make beautiful jewellery and accessories.

name: Round Brooches - 18mm, 20mm - Pick a size!
description:
Perfect little shallow round trays, just right for adding your choice of topping.  Finished in a silver tone, they will show off all your makes.  

Please note the brooches may have a plain or a serrated edge (pictured).  Where an option is available, this will show in the drop down list below.

Available in 18mm and 20mm internal diameter.

We think these would look perfect with our stickers - the easiest badges ever made!  But their possibilities don't stop there!  Try using them with an image under glass or adding a stamped polymer clay top, or even a felted pin-cushion top!  

Sold in packs of 10.  Stickers and glass sold separately.

name: Silver Plated Round Charm Blanks - 10, 12, 16 and 18mm
description:
Lovely little plain trays that are perfect for your resin or polymer clay work as well as for using together with our round glass cabochons.  

These little charm blanks come with a ring at the top that is parallel to the tray, which makes them perfect for charm bracelets, or use several of a similar theme on a bag charm - all you'll need are some jump rings!  Or how about hanging them directly from ear wires to make gorgeous personalised earrings? 

Of course, you can also use them as little pendants - just add a spring bail or a jump ring.

I can sense that these little charms will bring about a huge amount of project ideas!  Share your ideas on our Facebook page @jasmin studio crafts.

Available in the following sizes*:

- 10mm (choose between trays with a small 3mm ring or a medium 5mm ring on top - in our opinion the smaller ring version is perfect for earrings and the larger for charms and pendants)
- 12mm
- 16mm
- 18mm

*refers to internal diameter, same as the cab size required.  All sizes are approximately 2.5-3mm in depth.

They are sold in packs of 10, glass is sold separately.  Made of silver plated brass.  Lead and nickel free.

name: Tiny 10mm Pendant Blanks - Many Colours Available!
description:
Brand new in the shop! Cute 10mm trays, perfect with our 10mm round glass cabochons.

These little blanks come with a ring at the top that is perpendicular to the tray, which makes them perfect for pendants and for charms.

They are sold in packs of 10, glass is sold separately. Made of plated brass, and available in silver plated, antique silver, gold plated (not pictured), antique bronze, vintage copper and gunmetal black.  They are lead and nickel free.

The trays measure 10mm across (internally) and are approx 2mm high. The rings sit perpendicular to the tray so as long as your chain can go through the 2.5mm hole, you won't need any jump rings.

They will look great with our 10mm glass cabochons and epoxy stickers (sold separately).

We say these are fa-bu-lo-cious!

name: Teeny Connector Blanks 10mm - Reversible!
description:
Very sweet connector blanks - these can take a 10mm sticker or glass piece.  

They are perfect for making your own bracelets, necklaces and as connectors for long drop earrings. We have lots of projects in mind for these - see them soon in the blog being put into action!

The internal bezel measures 10mm in diameter, and the external diameter is about 14mm. They are very shallow at under 1mm in depth.  The little rings either side measure approximately 3mm and are closed, with a 1mm opening.  The ring sits flat next to the tray. 

These little blanks look the same front and back so you can, if you wish, attach an image and a cab on both sides - yeay, we love our reversibles! 

They are made of a metal alloy that is lead, nickel and cadmium free.  

Available in packs of 10 pieces, in a choice of antique silver, antique bronze, vintage copper or old gold.  

These connector blanks take 10mm glass or stickers, both available separately.

Buy more and save with our £2.50 flat postage rate for UK customers!  *(does not apply to international shipping)

name: Hair Clips for Decorating 50mm
description:
Useful new item for our crafting box of tricks, some fab new sprung hair clips over which you can set all your favourite items - consider felted flowers and corsages, little fabric decorations - we could go on!

The hairclips measure 50mm long (that's about 2 inches) and are 7mm (about a quarter of an inch) wide.  There is a ridged top surface for gluing, or two holes either end if you should prefer to sew your work onto them.

They open by a simple spring mechanism which clicks closed and stays in place.  They are reasonably flexible, and this will remain so if your toppings are a little flexible too.

Sold in packs of 10 pieces.

name: New Bobby Pins with Pad - Pick Your Own Colours!
description:
Lovely new bobby pins, measuring 50mm long (about 2 inches) and with an 8mm pad to hold your choice of topping.

You can do so much with these, glue on your own handmade fabric buttons, glass tiles, resin flower cabochons, felt or polymer clay shapes.... 

These hair grips are very similar to our hugely popular first edition of bobby pins, the main difference being that on these the pad is not soldered onto the top but securely gripped onto the pin itself.  

They are available in packs of 10 or 100 - choose your favourite colours out of the following, or let us pick for you!  

- Black 
- Antique Bronze
- Grey
- White 
- Turquoise 
- Bright Blue 
- Purple
- Lilac 
- Pale Pink 
- Bright Pink
- Deep Cerise Pink
- Deep Red
- Fox Brown 
- Dusty Brown 
- Lemon Yellow 
- Bright Green

Just note down your choices, and let us know during checkout or leave it to us - we guarantee a lovely mix of several colours.

We have other hair bits available in the shop with matching colours so you can coordinate your hair accessories beautifully!

options.name: 10 x Bobby Pins, your mix (email us your choice!)
10 x Bobby Pins Deep Cerise Pink
100 x Bobby Pins, mixed (email us your choice!)

name: 10 x Glittery Round Epoxy Stickers, all sizes in one listing! Prices from:
description:
We love our epoxy stickers!  These clear epoxy stickers serve pretty much the same purpose as our glass pieces - they make your images pop!  however, these are made of a flexible epoxy resin that is clear, durable, non-yellowing, dimensional, flexible, unbreakable, scratch-proof, and water resistant - and if that was not enough, they are also already coated with a strong adhesive, so you do not need to glue them onto your artwork with any glaze, you just peel and stick.   

The effect is wonderful - they are slightly domed so they have a dimensional effect on the pictures underneath.  They are completely clear so will show your images with exactly the same amount of clarity and crispness as the glass, and they are true to colour.   

Once the sticker is adhered to your image, you just need to cut around it and glue it into place in any pendant blank.   Please note that the dome is 1-2mm high - if you are used to our glass pieces, you may find that the stickers do not protrude as much as the glass, so you may want to use a lower edge bezel tray. 

They are available in several shapes and sizes, either completely clear or with a light sprinkling of glitter.   All equally beautiful, so try them all and see your projects take off in a new direction!

This listing is for 10 x GLITTERY round stickers in the size of your choice. Choose your required size from the drop-down list - this will also show you the price applicable to each size.

You may also choose (where available) between standard and pink glittery stickers which have just a slight tint of pink.

Please note the photo of the glittery sticker in a pendant, in comparison with a glass pendant.

Plain and glow in the dark stickers are available in other listings.

Please note that whilst the epoxy domes themselves are waterproof, the adhesive is not, and water resistance of your final piece depends ultimately on the graphics and glues you use, so I would always advise my customers to keep these items away from water as much as possible, and certainly never use them for swimming or in the shower!)

name: Shallow Scalloped Oval Pendant Trays 18x25mm
description:
So simple but so effective!  These fab trays are made from pressed brass sheet so they are quite slim, quite lightweight and full of crafting possibility.  They are framed by a pierced scalloped design which means you can use any of the little holes for your jump rings so they can be attached to your pieces every which way!  

Externally they measure approximately 28x34mm, and internally they are a little over 18x25mm.  They are only about 1mm high so really quite shallow - which makes them lovely to use with our stickers.

This listing is for a pack of 10 trays, in antique bronze finish.

Show us what you make with them!

name: Silver Plated Bangle for 13x18mm Oval Cabochon
description:
This is so pretty, and with an original cabochon on top, it is worthy of a boutique front window!

The bangle is made of strong silver plated flat wire, and the oval tray serves as a catch.  In order to do up the bangle for daily wear, the loop on the tray simply fastens onto the hook on the wire.

This listing includes one bangle (with tray).  Glass is sold separately, look out for 13x18mm oval cabochons, or why not try our fab epoxy stickers?

name: European Spring-Back Earrings with Ring
description:
Lovely earring findings for pierced ears, with a sprung back (called a European fitting) and a little open ring to hang your choice of strung bead or little charm. 

Available in value packs of 10 pairs, these come in a rainbow of colours:
- silver plated
- gold plated 
- antique bronze
- vintage copper
- gunmetal black.  

The earrings measure 16x10mm, and the inside of the ring is 1.5mm - it helps that it is an open ring, so with your pliers you can gently twist it open, and twist it closed again, without needing to make difficult loops around the ring.

They are made of copper, and as with all our metal items, these earrings are lead and nickel free.

name: 20x30mm Oval Glass Cabochons
description:
Lovely crystal clear glass cabochons in a fab new size of 20x30mm, or rather, they measure slightly under 20x30mm, so that you can fit them into 20x30mm trays of your choice (look out for a new range soon!).

(Please note this size is not the best fit for the 22x30mm trays we currently sell, but we do sell 22x30mm glass that fits perfectly.)

These glass pieces are beautifully smooth and will do wonders to enhance any image that you choose to pop underneath.  Simply glue to a sealed image using Diamond Glaze and see your pictures pop!

The cabs are about 5mm high.  They are sold in packs of 10 pieces.

name: Sterling Silver Pendant Trays - Round and Oval
description:
Long awaited and long coveted, the sterling silver pendant trays are here!!

Available in 15mm, 18mm and 25mm round, and 13x28mm, 18x25mm or 30x40mm oval, to take round and oval cabochons of the same size, these silver trays are very special.  They range in depth from about 1mm (shallow style) to 3-4mm (standard range).

They have been hallmarked by the London Assay Office, so you can be sure that they are a quality item.

For those customers who have bought our silver trays before, please note that the style has changed slightly - instead of the bail being soldered straight onto the pendant tray, there is now a little ring soldered to the tray and the bail now hangs off this ring.  The end result is a more fluid, more flexible and sturdier piece that will show  your work at its best.

If you are used to our alloy pendant trays, these sterling silver ones are made of 0.3mm silver sheet so will feel lighter in weight, but rest assured they are 100% sterling silver.  They are also strong, with a well soldered ring and bail.  

The pendants are ready to use but you can achieve a brighter mirror finish yourself reasonably easily with some very fine polishing papers or attachments for your pendant drill.

The bezel edge is between 3mm to 4mm high, except in the shallow style where it is approximately 1mm.

The trays are sold individually, with a glass cabochon to fit.

name: Crystal Clear Glass Rectangles Domino Tiles 25x50mm
description:
These are beautiful!!  Smooth, flat, crystal clear glass rectangles with rounded corners perfect for jewellery making.  Just add a bail for a vertical pendant, or two bails for a horizontal pendant.  

The tiles measure 25x50mm (approximately 1x2 inches).  They are made of perfectly clear colourless glass. 

This new size is perfect for the rectangular bangles we sell.  Please note this size will not fit into our 24x48mm rectangular trays, however we do stock glass of the correct size to fit the trays.

This listing is for packs of 10 rectangular tiles.

Please see other listings in our shop for all the items you will need to make beautiful jewellery and accessories.  We have lots of bails, pendant blanks, Chiyogami papers, E6000 glue, Judikins Diamond Glaze and much much more!

Happy making!

name: Round Scalloped Brooches 25mm
description:
Fab new round scalloped edge brooches that will take an insert measuring 25mm across.  

Finished in antique bronze tone, we think these look amazing with our 25mm high dome glass - the extra height will really make your images pop!  Or try using them with embroideries, set onto our 1-inch wooden blanks.  Whatever use you put them to, we are sure you will love them!

They measure 26.5mm across externally and 4mm high, and the brooch pin at the back is 20mm long.  They are a little over 25mm internally, and the edge can be gently pushed down onto your insert for a secure finish.

Sold in packs of 10, currently available in antique bronze.  Glass picture is not included but sold separately (look for 25mm high domed cabochons).

name: Scalloped Oval Trays 18x25mm
description:
Brand new in the shop - these scalloped trays are really very clever.

You can add your gemstone cab or glass piece, and after you have glued it down, you can either keep the tabs up or press them down to hug the stone or glass. Not only that, but if you pull back one tab with your jewellery pliers, this serves as a little bail for a jump ring so that you can hang it onto a necklace or bracelet easily for a pretty pendant or charm; and if you pull down two tabs, you have a ready-made connector blank! You can make an entire bracelet with just these trays, a few jump rings and a clasp!

Currently available in antique bronze, these fab trays measure 18x25mm internally and the edge is 3mm high.  They can be used with our 18x25mm oval glass cabochons.

Sold in packs of 10 pieces.

Try them, they're great!

name: 10 x Glow in the Dark Round Epoxy Stickers, all sizes in one listing! Prices from:
description:
We love our epoxy stickers!  They are available in various sizes to fit our trays.  We know you love them too, but have you tried our glow in the dark stickers?

These fab epoxy stickers sit over your images and give them a blue hue in the daytime - however they really come to life in the dark, where they emit a soft glow - ideal for keyrings for those of us who sometimes lose our keys...  simply switch the lights off!  

These are made of a flexible epoxy resin that is durable, flexible, unbreakable, scratch-proof, and water resistant - and if that was not enough, they are also already coated with a strong adhesive, so you do not need to glue them onto your artwork with any glaze, you just peel and stick.   

Once the sticker is adhered to your image, you just need to cut around it and glue it into place in any pendant blank.   Please note that the dome is about 2-3mm high - if you are used to our glass pieces, you may find that the stickers do not protrude as much as the glass, so you may want to use a lower edge bezel tray (for pendants, the trays with the long hoop bail are ideal). 

These stickers measure an exact 25mm so they are just the right size for our 25mm trays.  

They are available in several shapes and sizes, either completely clear or with a light sprinkling of silvery or pink glitter, and in this fab new version that glows in the dark!   

Please note that the glow in the dark stickers are a light milky blue, unlike our other types which are clear.  They work best when exposed to bright UV light for some time for their glow-in-the-dark properties to show at their best.

All are equally beautiful, so try them all and see your projects take off in a new direction!

This listing is for 10 x round glow in the dark stickers in your choice of sizes - see the drop down list for options.

(Please note that whilst the epoxy domes themselves are waterproof, the adhesive is not, and water resistance of your final piece depends ultimately on the graphics and glues you use, so we would always advise our customers to keep these items away from water as much as possible, and certainly never use them for swimming or in the shower!)

name: E6000 Glue - Choice of Sizes
description:
The jewellers' glue of choice, E6000 is a clear industrial strength adhesive that will bond most materials and will remain flexible thus able to withstand small changes due to material vibration or expansion.  Exceptional adhesion to wood, metal, glass, fibreglass, ceramics, masonry and concrete.  Adheres strongly to leather, vinyl and most plastics (however, it is not for use on polysterene).  It is loved by reborn-ers everywhere as well as jewellers, who use it, amongst hundreds of other uses, to attach bails to glass cabochons or scrabble tiles to make beautiful pendants.

It will feel dry to the touch within minutes but requires 24hrs to fully cure.

Although we have secured some applicators tubes for the medium size of E6000 which you can buy separately, E6000 glues as a rule do not come with an applicator, so we would recommend pouring a tiny bit onto a disposable piece of plastic, foil or paper and using a toothpick or lolly stick to apply just the right amount for your project.

Please note the labelling may sometimes vary from that in the picture.

Warning:  E6000 does smell rather strong and comes with health warnings, it is very toxic so do not inhale the vapours and only use it if you can work in a very well ventilated area.  

Please note the contents of the Materials Safety Data Sheet (MSDS) here: http://www.eclecticproducts.com/_msds/e6000_english.pdf

This listing is for your choice of a small 0.18 fl oz tube (5.32ml), or a medium 0.3 fl oz tube (9ml).  

Applicators are only available for the medium size.  Please note that the applicators do not come with lids.

Please see other listings in our shop for all the items you will need to make beautiful jewellery and accessories.

name: Crystal Clear Square Glass Tiles 35x35mm
description:
Beautiful square clear glass tiles, measuring 35mm per side and 4.5mm thick.

This listing is for a pack of 10 tiles or buy in larger quantities and save!

These are top quality completely clear glass tiles, very shiny and totally see-through - they will make your images jump!

They have safe rounded corners, making them ideal for pendants. Just glue on a bail or why not try and make a set of magnets?

Please see other listings in the shop for all the items you will need to make beautiful jewellery and accessories.

We offer a low £2.50 flat shipping rate within the UK - buy more and don't pay any more in postage!

name: Crystal Clear Domed Round Glass Cabochons 50mm
description:
Beautiful round clear glass domed cabochons, measuring 50mm (a notch under 2 inches) across.  They are 9mm high at the middle point, tapering down to 2mm at the edges.

This listing is for a pack of 10 cabs.

These are top quality completely clear glass cabochons, very smooth, shiny and totally see-through. They a have a magnifying effect on the patterns they sit on so they will make your images jump!

They have safe rounded edges, making them ideal for pendants, brooches or keyrings. Just add on a bail or try and make a set of magnets.

Please see other listings in my shop for all the items you will need to make beautiful jewellery and accessories.

We offer a low £2.50 flat shipping rate within the UK - buy more and don't pay any more in postage!

name: Tiny Pinecone Charms
description:
Very cute little pinecone charms, made of zinc alloy that is lead and nickel free, and plated in antique silver.  Ideal for colder days crafting!

They are a gorgeous small size, measuring only 8x8x12mm, and the ring is 2mm in diameter.

Very realistic!

You will receive 10 teeny pinecones per pack purchased.

name: Small Swooping Swallow Pendants
description:
Little zinc alloy pendants in the form of a down-swooping bird - the split tail made us think of swallows!   

These little pendants have a wingspan of 25mm and measure 16mm beak to tail.  The hole measures about 1.8mm and can take a small bail or a jump ring.  The birds are a fraction over 1mm thick.

They are made of a zinc alloy that is lead and nickel free, and you will receive 10 pieces in a pack.  Available in antique silver.

The swallows all face left.

name: Seahorse Charms - Silver or Bronze
description:
Lovely new charms, in the shape of a seahorse.  Available in antique silver or bronze, these little cuties measure 13.5x29mm and the ring hole is 1.8mm so it will fit our smallest chains or hang them as bracelet charms using a jump ring.

These charms are made of zinc alloy and are nickel, lead and cadmium free.

Sold in packs of 10 pieces.

The seahorses all face left.

name: New Little Glass Vial Pendants - Choose your Favourite Shape!
description:
Here we have a fab new item - lovely little vials to fill as you wish.  They come in three shapes, tube, sphere and heart - all equally gorgeous.

The glass pieces have a rubber stopper and a metal top which is to be glued down onto the glass once filled.  The metal tops have holes for a jump ring.

They are available individually or in packs of 10 (all same style or mixed - simply email us your choice, or let us choose for you!)

Their measurements are as follows (d x w x h):

- Tube: 5x5x25mm (with metal top: 29mm)
- Sphere: 12x12x17mm (with metal top: 21mm)
- Heart: 9x15x19mm (with metal top: 24mm)

So, these are really teeny!  Just so you can get a better understanding of their size, see the last picture which shows one of each of our vials encased into one of our popular 25mm square pendant trays!  

The opening at the top of the glass is approximately 3.5mm across, and you can still get a good amount of fill - question is, what will you choose??   Tiny seed beads? Some sand from a favourite beach? Baby hair? We can think of 1001 things to fill these with - look out for a blog feature coming soon!! 

**please be aware the open edge of the glass can be slightly uneven and sharp.  This will be hidden under the metal top so will not show when the finished piece is sealed, but please use adequate precautions when handling this product**

These are just lovely - they immediately became a firm favourite of ours.

These snap clips are available in mixed packs of ten (our choice), pick'n'mix (your choice) in packs of ten or one hundred. We also sell them in packs of ten of each individual colour - choose your favourite colours out of the following:

name: Vintage Style Heart Pendant Trays for 25mm Glass Hearts
description:
New antique style trays that will be excellent in all your vintage bijoux creations! They are perfect both for charms and pendants, and they will take heart-shaped glass cabochons measuring 25mm. 

These pendants are made of a zinc alloy and they come in antique silver or antique bronze. 

They are sold in packs of 10. The glass is not included in this listing but is available separately.

name: 10 x Clear Round Epoxy Stickers, all sizes in one listing! Prices from:
description:
We love our epoxy stickers!  These completely clear epoxy stickers serve pretty much the same purpose as our glass pieces - they make your images pop!  however, these are made of a flexible epoxy resin that is clear, durable, non-yellowing, dimensional, flexible, unbreakable, scratch-proof, and water resistant - and if that was not enough, they are also already coated with a strong adhesive, so you do not need to glue them onto your artwork with any glaze, you just peel and stick.   

The effect is wonderful - they are slightly domed so they have a dimensional effect on the pictures underneath.  They are completely clear so will show your images with exactly the same amount of clarity and crispness as the glass, and they are true to colour.   

Once the sticker is adhered to your image, you just need to cut around it and glue it into place in any pendant blank.   Please note that the dome is 1-2mm high - if you are used to our glass pieces, you may find that the stickers do not protrude as much as the glass, so you may want to use a lower edge bezel tray. 

They are available in several shapes and sizes, either completely clear or with a light sprinkling of glitter.   All equally beautiful, so try them all and see your projects take off in a new direction!

This listing is for 10 x clear round stickers in the size of your choice. Choose your required size from the drop-down list - this will also show you the price applicable to each size.

Glittery and glow in the dark stickers are available in other listings.

Please note that whilst the epoxy domes themselves are waterproof, the adhesive is not, and water resistance of your final piece depends ultimately on the graphics and glues you use, so we would always advise our customers to keep these items away from water as much as possible, and certainly never use them for swimming or in the shower!)

name: Diamond Glaze - all sizes in one listing!
description:
Diamond Glaze is a dimensional adhesive that dries to a clear glass-like finish. It is ideal for making glass and scrabble tile pendants, and has a great range of uses as a resin filler (for example, use on our pendant blanks to embed pictures) as it will dry to a slight dome.  It securely holds vellum, glass beads, glitter and many other mediums. Unlike other clear adhesives, Diamond Glaze™ is mixable with dye-based inks, watercolor, pearlescent pigments and more.

Use it to glue a sealed image to a glass cabochon or tile and then to a pendant tray. We have more information about this on our blog - you're welcome to visit!  http://www.jasminstudiocrafts.blogspot.com

This listing offers a choice of sizes - just pick your preferred size from the drop down list.   We have:

 - 2 fl oz/60ml bottles £5.25
 - 8 fl oz/240ml economy size bottles £15.50
 - 18 fl oz/532ml refill bottle £25

Remember to seal your photographs and images well with decoupage glue (see Mod Podge listing) before coating with Diamond Glaze as it can make some inks bleed.

Please see other listings in our shop for all the items you will need to make beautiful jewellery and accessories.

We offer a low £2.50 flat shipping rate within the UK - buy more and don't pay any more in postage!

name: Ball Chain Keyrings - 10cm/4in
description:
Useful little ball chains of only 4 inches / 10 cm, ideal for making key chains out of your pendants.  

These little key chains are sold in packs of 10 pieces, and are made of iron that has been rhodium plated.  They come ready made as little key chains with the connector clasp included.

The last picture shows them teamed with our 18mm trays and stickers to make a fabby name tag for a school lunchbox.  We think you will agree that there is nothing easier!

name: Chain Necklaces 2.4mm 24in/60cm, Packs of 10 - Many Colours Available!
description:
Beautiful quality necklaces, brand new in our shop!  Your glass tile pendants will feel right at home dangling from these necklaces!

These chains are made of plated iron, and come ready to use, made up as necklaces measuring 24 inches (60cm) with a lovely quality 12mm lobster clasp at the end of each and a jump ring at the opposite end.  

The links measure 4.5x3 and are made of what is known in the industry as 'flat oval trace' chain.  To get an idea of their size, see the picture showing them next to one of our popular 25mm glass tiles (glass not included in this listing, evidently!).
 
The final jump rings measure 4.3mm in diameter, so these chains will fit a lot of our bails and pendants.  However do double check sizes to be sure!  If it is a bit of a squeeze the jump ring can be removed and re-positioned once you have threaded the chain into your bail.  However, these chains will not fit our smallest flower bails, jump ring or no jump ring.  

Available in packs of 10 or 100, in the following colours:
- Silver Plated
- Antique Silver
- Antique Bronze
- Vintage Copper
- Gunmetal Black
- Solid Black

These chains are lead and nickel free.

options.name: 100 x Chains (email us your colour preference)

name: Ornate Square Pendant Setting Blanks 25mm - Choice of Colours!
description:
Beautiful antique finish vintage style pendant trays for making your own pendants.  They are available in two beautiful colours: antique silver and antique bronze.  

The opening of these trays measures 25x25mm and is just right for the 25mm square glass pieces and epoxy stickers that we sell in the shop (not included in this listing).  Ideal to fill with your own images.

* please note that Diamond Glaze reacts with items with antique finishes and will give your images a bluish tint - to avoid this, please seal the images well with 2 to 3 coats of decoupage glue, Mod Podge or diluted PVA glue. Also seal the space where the paper will sit into the pendant tray with the same glue.  Once dry, you can attach the paper to the glue.

The base for the glass insert is 25mm up and down and approximately 1mm in depth.  The bail opening measures 4.5mm in diameter.

This listing is for 10 x pendant trays. 

Please note the glass cabochons in the photos are for illustration only and NOT included in this sale.  If you would like to purchase some glass pieces, they are available in the shop.

name: 30mm Square Pendant Trays
description:
Can't tell you how excited we are about these trays - they are extreeemely gorgeous!  

Made of a quality alloy that has been plated in a choice of colours (silver plated, antique bronze and antique copper plated), these trays are sure to take your designs to the next level.    The inside bezel measures 30x30mm, it is about 2.5mm deep, and the metal within is etched with a pattern so that your glue will have lots of surface area to stick your designs down.  There is also a beatiful linear design at the back of the pendant.  

The inside bail measures 6x4mm.

These trays are sold in packs of 10.  The 30mm glass that fits these trays is sold separately.

name: Crystal Clear Epoxy Stickers, 60x50mm Big Hearts
description:
We designed these gorgeous heart stickers measuring 60x50mm specifically to fit into our popular big heart trays of the same size.  

Stickers make great safe glossy covers for your images for when you need to make something quickly. They are ideal for last-minute presents!  These large stickers are perfect for keyrings and Christmas  decorations.  Or use them in all your cardmaking and scrapbooking projects. Our photographs are just one example of the items you can make with these gorgeous stickers!

They measure approx 60x50mm and are approximately 2mm high, and they are totally clear, and will not yellow or distort your images.

They are self-adhering, so to make your own unique pieces of jewellery all you need to do is pop them over your chosen image and glue this into your trays. 

These stickers are sold in packs of 2 or 10.

Please note these stickers are shown in the pictures together with the big heart trays - these are not included in this listing but are available separately in the shop.

As part of the production process for these stickers, some of the paper backing may show a slight oily residue, this is absolutely normal and does not impair the quality of the stickers.

Have we mentioned that they look amazing?

name: Antique Bronze Locket Rings - Limited Stock!
description:
They are back!  Cute little lockets for your finger!  These little lockets carry an image on top of 13mm, and they open to reveal a space for two pictures inside of approximately 14.5mm in diameter.

The overall diameter of the locket is 20mm. The ring measures 17.5mm in diameter but is adjustable to bigger sizes.

The top of the locket takes a 13mm sticker, available as an option or separately via our epoxy sticker listings.  The 13mm size is perfect for this.  Or you can use your favourite charm, our 15mm chrysanthemums for example, sit very nicely on top.

Available in antique bronze only, individually or in packs of 5.

We have only a limited stock of these, get them before they run out!

name: 20.5mm Square Pendant Trays for Stickers
description:
Beautiful new pendant blanks for pendants.  These are the smaller sister (brother?) to our popular 25mm trays, coming in at slightly over 20mm.  These little beauties come in silver plated topped with our fabulous epoxy stickers, which are available separately, and a bit of your own magic, they make truly stunning pieces of jewellery.  

Each little blank measures 20.5mm internally, and 23x32mm externally.  They are 3.2mm thick, and the bezel is 2mm deep. The ring at the top has a 3.5x6mm opening.

**Important Note ** 
Our 20mm glass feels a little too loose in these trays - we recommend using our 20.5mm square stickers which have been specifically designed for a perfect fit.  Stickers are not included in this sale but are available separately.
  
They are made of plated metal alloy, and are nickel and lead free.  
  
These blanks are sold in packs of 10, currently available in silver plated finish.  You can purchase the stickers to fit inside these blanks separately.

name: Screw-top Photo Cufflinks - Gold or Silver
description:
Top quality photo cufflinks, for you to add your own image.  The top screws on to the base of the cufflink, and a round slice of strong acetate is included to protect your image.  

We have not yet found a better quality of cufflink - these really are for keeps!  They are a lovely heavy weight and feel good and sturdy, with a beautiful finish.  

If you make cufflinks for sale, you can be sure your customers will love these.  If you make cufflinks for gifts, we can guarantee the lucky recipient will be impressed!

They measure 17x25mm overall, and take a 14.5mm image in a  visible window of just over 12mm.  The cufflinks are made of plated brass and are free of nickel and lead.

Each cufflink is packed individually to ensure pieces are not damaged in transit so you can be sure you will receive the best quality possible.

Available in silver and gold plated finish, in packs of 1, 5 or 10 pairs, simply pick your option from the drop down list.

name: Silver Plated Snake Chain Necklaces - 18in/46cm
description:
Beautiful new necklace, tried and tested to stay beautiful!  These snake chain necklaces are slinky and fluid and gorgeous and will look fantastic with your handcrafted pendants.  

They are made of silver plated brass, that is both lead free and nickel free, and they measure 1.3mm wide and 46cm long, which is approximately 18 inches.  Please note that because of the clasp ring at one end, bails smaller than 4mm may not fit (although the ring is open so it is removable if need be).

Please be aware that silver plated products (as well as sterling silver) can tarnish.  This happens as a result of the silver becoming oxidised by contact with air, skin, water and cosmetics, so avoid prolonged use to maintain your silver plated items looking good and keep all plated items covered when not in use.

name: Square Cufflinks with 16mm Bezel Cup - now in many colours!
description:
Lovely plated cufflink blanks, these are made of plated brass.  The square bezel measures a fraction over 16mm.

Available in Silver Plated, Gold Plated, Antique Bronze, Vintage Copper and Black.

**IMPORTANT NOTE** 
Please be aware glass is not included in this listing, but is available separately. Please look for the 16mm flat or 15mm domed square glass tiles which can be purchased elsewhere in the shop.  The 15mm tiles will fit loosely into this cufflink setting, but will look nice if centred well.

These cufflinks are ideal for using with resin, polymer clay, gemstones and glass tiles. For use with glass you will require a completely clear glaze to ensure the image shows through clearly under the glass - Diamond Glaze, available on a separate listing, is ideal for this. Remember to coat any image well with sealant or decoupage glue before applying the glaze so that the colours do not run. Always test your paper before making up the final piece.

Please see other listings in my shop for all the items you will need to make these cufflinks and other beautiful jewellery and accessories.

We offer a low £2.50 flat shipping rate within the UK - buy more and don't spend any more on postage!

name: Round Lockets 30mm with Epoxy Sticker Insert - Silver or Bronze
description:
New lockets, for adding your own pictures inside and on top.   They have a gently patterned front and smooth plain back.  The lockets measure approximately 30mm in diameter, with the ring at the top adding an extra 4mm.  The inside ring is 2mm, fine for our snap bails.

The front bezel measures 19mm in diameter, and for ease of use, we are selling these with epoxy stickers of the same size and matching bails.  Internally, you can use round images of about 24mm diameter.

They are made of plated brass, that is lead and nickel free and are available in silver plated finish or antique bronze.

name: Photo Frame Connectors - Squares 14mm
description:
Beautiful new item in the shop - fantastic photo frame connector blanks.  

These are super easy to use - they come with a double sided bit of acetate so all you have to do is pick an image or photo, cut it to fit, sandwich it inside the acetate and pop back into the frame!  Whilst with the pendants using glue is optional, for the connector frames you really will need a tiny drop at the opening for a secure seal, and to ensure your images don't slide out! 

These little squares measure 20x26x3mm externally and have a visible window of 14x14mm.  The two rings at either side measure about 1.5mm in diameter.

They are a great size for bracelets, simply pick the number of frames you wish to use, link them together with jump rings, and add some chain with a clasp at the ends if required, or you can attach the frames directly to a clasp with a jump ring.  For a full all-the-way-round bracelet you will need about six or seven frames, but use five with a little bit of chain and they will look great too.

They are available individually or in packs of 10 pieces.  Currently available in a lovely silver plated finish that, like all our items, is lead and nickel free.

Please note the individual price is for one frame, whereas the bracelet pictured is made up of a number of frames.

Try them and fall in love!

name: Photo Frame Pendants - Squares 18mm
description:

These are super easy to use - they come with a double sided bit of acetate so all you have to do is pick an image or photo, cut it to fit, sandwich it inside the acetate and pop back into the frame!  You may find a tiny drop of glue at the top makes for a secure seal, however, if you don't use the glue it means the image can change!  Imagine - you can now customise your jewellery according to your mood, your outfit...  

Of course, the images inside the pendant will be easily affected by moisture, so this is not the pendant to wear in the rain or in the shower!

These little squares measure 24x28x3mm externally and have a visible window of approximately 17x18mm.  The ring at the top measures about 1.5mm in diameter.

They are a great size for necklaces and to add detail on keyrings and bag charms.

They are available individually or in packs of 10 pieces.  Currently available in a lovely silver plated finish that, like all our items, is lead and nickel free.

name: Make Your Own Fabric Buttons!  45mm Self-Cover Buttons
description:
Add a new creative twist to your jewellery with these lovely button making kits.  

You start with two pieces of metal and end up with a beautiful button that is covered in the fabric of your choice.  

These buttons measure 45mm and are available in two versions:  flat back and wire back.  The flat back buttons are ideal for gluing onto rings, earrings, hair pins and pendant findings, and the wire back buttons are perfect for stringing and for threading onto hairbands.  

These buttons are offered with the option of a making tool for assembling your buttons (you only need to purchase it once for buttons of the same size).

To make your pretty buttons just pick some fabric – thin fabric is best – and cut a circle that’s about 1-1.5cm wider than your button.  Pop the fabric onto the white part of the tool, pattern-side facing down, and sit your button over this, ensuring that any pattern is centered in the position you want it to be (this can sometimes be a bit tricky!), and then with the red bit of the tool, press down into the white bit so that the fabric and button top are snug inside the white part of the tool.  Bunch the fabric back into the button and finally, place the back of the button on top, ensuring it is perfectly centered, and with the red bit of the tool again press down hard so that it fits right inside the button.  Finally, pop the button out by pressing onto the flat side of the tool, and there you go, a perfect button that you have made yourself!

Check our blog entry for instructions with pictures:  http://jasminstudiocrafts.blogspot.com/2011/09/make-your-own-buttons.html

Available in packs of 10 or 100, each pack is supplied with a making tool as an option.   We also have many other sizes on separate listings.
