These buttons are offered with the option of a making tool for assembling your buttons (you only need to purchase it once for buttons of the same size).

To make your pretty buttons just pick some fabric – thin fabric is best – and cut a circle that’s about 1-1.5cm wider than your button.  Pop the fabric onto the white part of the tool, pattern-side facing down, and sit your button over this, ensuring that any pattern is centered in the position you want it to be (this can sometimes be a bit tricky!), and then with the red bit of the tool, press down into the white bit so that the fabric and button top are snug inside the white part of the tool.  Bunch the fabric back into the button and finally, place the back of the button on top, ensuring it is perfectly centered, and with the red bit of the tool again press down hard so that it fits right inside the button.  Finally, pop the button out by pressing onto the flat side of the tool, and there you go, a perfect button that you have made yourself!

Check our blog entry for instructions with pictures:  http://jasminstudiocrafts.blogspot.com/2011/09/make-your-own-buttons.html

Available in packs of 10 or 100, each pack is supplied with a making tool as an option.   We also have many other sizes on separate listings.

name: Your Choice of Artisan Italian Paper - 10x10cm Piece
description:
Artisan Italian papers in beautiful classic designs, especially chosen for their usability in glass tile jewellery.  They are smooth and beautifully printed on pale yellow paper which gives them an instant touch of vintage.

Want to see a picture of the designs in a bit more detail? Click your chosen picture for a bigger view.  

With reference to the pictures, they show an approximate 5cm square cutout, except for the musical note paper, for which the picture shows a much larger 20cm section (approximately).

You will receive a piece that measures on average 10x10cm, about 4x4in, though some pieces will be slightly bigger and some will be slightly smaller (but only slightly!).  This listing is for one 10x10cm piece of your choice.
 
To buy, please choose by using the number reference provided in the photos.  If you have a favourite that is not in stock, it will not show on the drop down list, but feel free to send us an email and we will try restock it for you!

We currently have available:

1 - Dotty Flowers, Purple and Green
2 - Dotty Flowers, Blue and Red
3 - Dotty Flowers, Green and Red
4 - Graphic Circles, Red and Blue
5 - Little Flowers, Pink
6 - Little Flowers, Blue and Yellow
7 - Little Flowers, Orange and Yellow
8 - Flowers, Peach and Blue
9 - Vintage Musical Score
10 - Florentine Swirls, Pink
11 - Florentine Swirls, Orange

If you intend to use these papers for your glass tile jewellery, we recommend you coat the paper on all sides and edges with ModPodge or similar sealant. However these papers don't need as much delicate treatment as the chiyogami, so they are suitable for most uses, and will look great under both stickers and glass and are fantastic for decoupage.

name: Crackle Accents by Inkssentials 60ml/2fl oz
description:
A fantastic new product, a must-have if you love the vintage look - you can now create your very own vintage images with an aged, cracked look!  

Crackle Accents™ is a one-step, dimensional, gloss medium that dries to a cracked finish. Create crackled looks on most porous surfaces. Use to accent and protect rubber stamped images, decorative cardstock, clip art, die cuts, ephemera, stickers, chipboard letters, jewelry blanks and bottle cap art. Great for paper crafters, card makers, scrapbookers and altered artists. Dries to a hard transparent finish, and also works as a glue.

Sold in 60ml/2fl oz bottles.

name: Crystal Clear Domed Square Glass Tiles 8mm
description:
Beautiful crystal clear domed square glass tiles.  These tiny glass pieces have a magnifying effect on the images they sit over so your graphics will come alive.

This listing is for a pack of of 10 (ten) domed glass tiles measuring 8x8mm.

To use for jewellery, just coat your images with Mod Podge to seal (available from our shop), and once dry glue to the glass with Diamond Glaze.  Another layer of Diamond Glaze over the back will help protect your image.  Allow the piece to dry flat for a few hours, or even better, overnight, then glue the glass to your jewellery blank and you're all set! The glass will really make your images pop!

Also available in other shapes and sizes.

Please see other listings in my shop for all the items you will need to make beautiful jewellery and accessories.  I have lots of bails, pendant blanks, Chiyogami papers, E6000 glue, Judikins Diamond Glaze and much much more!

Happy making!

We have used it to glue images to glass with great results, however please bear in mind this product is much thicker than our glazes, so it is probably best intended for the small pieces of glass as it can spread unevenly on larger pieces.

name: Scalloped Round Trays 12mm - Silver or Bronze or Steel Tone
description:
Brand new in the shop - these scalloped trays are really very clever.  

You can add your gemstone cab or glass piece, and after you have glued it down, you can either keep the tabs up or press them down to hug the stone or glass.  Not only that, but if you pull back one tab with your jewellery pliers, this serves as a little bail for a jump ring so that you can hang it onto a necklace or bracelet easily for a pretty pendant or charm; and if you pull down two tabs, you have a ready-made connector blank!  You can make an entire bracelet with just these trays, a few jump rings and a clasp!

You can also thread the tab onto an earwire, and there you go, ready made earrings! 

Or, even simpler, just glue a magnet at the back!  Nothing is easier.

Currently available in silver plated, steel tone or bronze, the internal diameter of these little trays is 12mm, and can be used with our 12mm glass cabochons.  Steel tone looks great with antique silver fittings.

Sold in packs of 10 trays.

Try them, they're great!

Glossy Accents™ is a clear, three-dimensional gloss medium. Use to accent, brighten, dimensionalise and magnify distinct areas on any scrapbook page, album cover, rubber stamped image, paper craft or home décor project. Place Glossy Accents™ under embellishments to make them stick and on top to protect and glossify!

The daisies measure 15mm across and 2mm deep, so these bracelets will be perfect for resin or polymer clay work.

description:
These diddy little tags may just be one of the most useful items in any  jewellery maker's kitbag - and they have been extremely hard to find, but we are pleased to announce they are finally here.  Now you can dangle all your cabochons, resin flowers, recycled finds and other diddy beauties from these tiny tags.  

Sometimes you don't want a great big shiny bail over a diddy little cab or a tiny little resin flower.  The best thing about these tags is that being so little they don't detract the attention from the item they carry, and all you can see when they are glued is the tiny little ring at the top.

Did we mention that they are tiny?  They measure 8mm at the widest part (10.5mm overall) and they are 0.3mm thick. The inside of the ring is just 1.5mm.

Simply glue your favourite items onto the wider part and add a jump ring to dangle from bracelets, pendants, or attach directly to your favourite earwires.  See the example we made with our little resin cherry blossoms (available separately) - a tiny flirty dangly earring, so cute!

description:
New in!  A lovely silver plated square ring to take a 16mm glass or gemstone tile or artwork, will allow you to wear your creation on your finger, ready for a view at the flick of a digit!

**IMPORTANT NOTE** 
Please be aware glass tiles are not included in this listing, but are available separately. Please look for 16mm Glass Tiles to ensure a good fit.

These rings are ideal for using with resin, polymer clay, gemstones and glass tiles. For use with glass tiles you will require a completely clear glaze to ensure the image shows through clearly under the glass - Diamond Glaze, available on a separate listing, is ideal for this. Remember to coat any image well with sealant or decoupage glue before applying the glaze so that the colours do not run. Always test your paper before making up the final piece.  Using just a touch of the Diamond Glaze over your sealed image, you will see your graphics come alive under the magnifying effect of the crystal clear glass.  

The ring band is fully adjustable to your size.  

This ring blank is available individually or in economical packs of 10.  Available in silver plated finish.

These blanks measure 45x45mm internally, and 48x48mm externally.  They are 4mm thick, the bezel tray is 2.8mm deep, and the two rings at the top have a 2.5mm opening.  

They are made of plated metal alloy, and are nickel and lead free.  
These blanks are sold in packs of 2, in a choice of vintage colour finishes (antique silver, old gold and antique bronze).  

You can either use these trays with resin or polymer clays, or you can purchase the stickers to fit inside these blanks separately, just look for our 45mm square stickers. Each little blank measures 14.5x20mm internally, and 18x24mm externally.  They are 2.7mm thick, and the bezel is jsut under 1mm deep. The ring at the top has a 2.4mm opening.

These blanks are sold in packs of 10, in a choice of vintage colours, just pick your favourite from the drop down box.  If your favourite does not appear, it could be temporarily out of stock - do check with us!

name: Beautiful Small Bails - Many Colours!
description:
Teeny little glue-on bails for use with dichroic cabochons, Scrabble tiles and glass tiles to make lovely pendants.   These littlies are very similar to Aanraku bails, the silver and gold plated ones are shiny smooth and the antique bronze and vintage copper are a little more matte, but all colours have a lovely plating.  They measure 6x16mm (with the gluing pad being 6x8mm) and the opening is 2.5x4mm. 

Please note the size of the opening when buying these to ensure your chains will fit as the opening is quite small!  (Ready-made voile, ribbon or leather necklaces will most likely not fit through the gap, but ball chain will)

Choose to buy a pack of 10 or buy a wholesale pack of 100 and save!  Available in silver plated, gold plated, antique bronze and vintage copper.

To use, just coat the rough pad with E6000 glue, (available from the shop) allow to dry as flat and tight to the piece as possible and leave for a few hours, or even better, overnight.

Please see other listings in our shop for all the items you will need to make beautiful jewellery and accessories.  We stock Aanraku bails, Pendant Blanks, Chiyogami papers, E6000 glue, Judikins Diamond Glaze and much much more!

We offer a low £2.50 flat shipping rate within the UK - buy more and don't pay any more in postage!

name: Vintage Style Round Pendant Trays for 20mm glass
description:
New antique style pendants will be excellent in all your vintage bijoux creations - very Marie Antoinette! They take round glass cabochons measuring 20mm whereas the pendant itself measures approximately 30x34mm.

These pendants are made of a zinc alloy and they come inantique silver or antique bronze. They are sold in packs of 10. The glass is not included in this listing but is available separately.

name: Crystal Clear Domed Round Glass Cabochons 14mm
description:
Beautiful crystal clear standard domed glass cabochons. These beautiful glass pieces have a magnifying effect on the images they sit over so your graphics will come alive.

This listing is for a pack of of 10 or 100 glass cabochons measuring 14mm across and 4mm high.

To use for jewellery, just coat your images with Mod Podge to seal and once dry glue to the glass with Diamond Glaze. Another layer of Diamond Glaze over the back will help protect your image. Allow the piece to dry flat for a few hours, or even better, overnight, then glue the glass to your jewellery blank and you're all set! The glass will really make your images pop!

Also available in other shapes and sizes.

Please see other listings in my shop for all the items you will need to make beautiful jewellery and accessories. I have lots of bails, pendant blanks, Chiyogami papers, E6000 glue, Judikins Diamond Glaze and much much more!

Happy making!

name: Round Connector Blanks 14mm - choice of colours!
description:
Lovely little connector blanks - these take the little 14mm glass.  

They are perfect for making your own bracelets, necklaces and as connectors for long drop earrings.

The internal bezel measures 14mm in diameter, and the external diameter is about 16mm.  The little rings either side measure approximately 3mm and are closed, with a 1.5mm opening.  

We have connectors where the ring sits flat next to the tray or perpendicular to with the tray (that is to say if the tray is sitting flat on a surface, the rings would be upright).  There is not much between them, so if you don't express a preference, we will send our choice, but if you do prefer one type or the other, please let us know and we will try to send that.

Available in packs of 10 pieces, in a choice of silver plated, antique bronze, vintage copper or gunmetal black.  

These connector blanks take 14mm glass cabochons.  Please note glass is not included in this sale but is available separately.

Buy more and save with our £2.50 flat postage rate for UK customers!  *(does not apply to international shipping)

name: Scalloped Oval Trays 10x14mm - choice of colours!
description:
Brand new in the shop - these scalloped trays are really very clever.

You can add your gemstone cab or glass piece, and after you have glued it down, you can either keep the tabs up or press them down to hug the stone or glass. Not only that, but if you pull back one tab with your jewellery pliers, this serves as a little bail for a jump ring so that you can hang it onto a necklace or bracelet easily for a pretty pendant or tiny charm; and if you pull down two tabs, you have a ready-made connector blank! You can make an entire bracelet with just these trays, a few jump rings and a clasp!

You can also thread the tab onto an earwire, and there you go, ready made earrings!

Currently available in silver and gold plated, these little trays measure 10x14mm, and can be used with our 10x14mm oval glass cabochons. 

Sold in packs of 10 pieces

Try them, they're great!  We also have a bigger 13x18mm oval tray, and round ones in the same style.

name: Scalloped Oval Trays 13x18mm - choice of colours!
description:
Brand new in the shop - these scalloped trays are really very clever.

You can add your gemstone cab or glass piece, and after you have glued it down, you can either keep the tabs up or press them down to hug the stone or glass. Not only that, but if you pull back one tab with your jewellery pliers, this serves as a little bail for a jump ring so that you can hang it onto a necklace or bracelet easily for a pretty pendant or charm; and if you pull down two tabs, you have a ready-made connector blank! You can make an entire bracelet with just these trays, a few jump rings and a clasp!

You can also thread the tab onto an earwire, and there you go, ready made earrings!

Currently available in silver and gold plated, these little trays measure 13x18mm, and can be used with our 13x18mm oval glass cabochons.

Sold in packs of 10 pieces.

Try them, they're great!

name: Teardrop Glass Cabochons 18x25mm
description:
Beautiful new shape, a newcomer in our family of glass - these lovely crystal clear teardrops measure 18x25mm.  They are 5mm high.

Like the other shapes, these pretty pear glass pieces also have a magnifying effect on the images they sit over so your graphics will come alive.

Available in packs of 10 pieces.

Also available on a separate listing, smaller teardrops that measure 10x14mm.

name: Flat Wooden Circle Tiles 38mm (1.5 inch)
description:
A bigger sister to the popular wooden circles we sell, these flat circle tiles measure 38mm.  They can be painted, decoupaged, embellished and glazed, pyrographed, drilled, quilted, hewn, whittled and sculpted, and the list goes on and on.  They also provide a good base onto which you can mount your creations that use other media - say, embroidery for example.

They measure 1.5 inches/38mm in diameter and just over 3mm tall, and they fit into our round pendant trays though some pieces may need a little encouragement or a gentle bit of filing to ensure a good fit.  

Each pack contains 10 wooden circle tiles.

They are made of solid birch wood from renewable and managed sources.  They have been sanded to make them smooth and comfortable to wear.  We want no splinters here!

Try making your own magnets to give as presents!  Or, you could decorate one side finishing it with a layer of Diamond Glaze for a glossy resin-like look and then simply glue a bail on the back or try our epoxy stickers that fit these tiles perfectly.  If you prefer a slightly different look, see also our gorgeous new domed circles (as can be seen in the third picture).

Show us what you make on our Facebook page @ Jasmin Studio Crafts!

name: Savvy Crafter Hair Pins with 15mm Bezel - many colours!
description:
Our economical Savvy Crafter range of jewellery and adornments offers great value for money and these bezel hair pins, brand new today, are a great addition to your supplies drawer.

You can choose from four colours, silver, steel, gold or bronze plated - each hair pin holds a 15mm round bezel (of a depth of about 3mm) into which you can set one of our round glass bezel, an epoxy sticker, colourful polymer clays and your own artistic resins.  A huge range of possibilities!

No glass or stickers are included with this listing, but are available separately.

Our Savvy Crafter range offers incredible value for money and novel crafting opportunities - they may show a few surface blotches, but most likely this will not impair your final piece.   

This listing is for 10 pieces (5 pairs) of hairpins - in your choice of colour.

Do see our other listings for all the items you will need to make beautiful jewellery and accessories. We stock bails, Pendant Blanks, Chiyogami papers, E6000 glue, Judikins Diamond Glaze and much much more!

categories.name: Items by Range - Savvy Crafter Value Range

name: Sterling Silver Drop Earring with Bezel and Glass - Now in More Sizes!
description:
Fantastic new item, these sterling silver earrings will really take your jewellery to a new level.  

They are of a beautiful, sturdy quality.  Made of sterling silver kidney shaped wire with a hook fastening at the back, they measure approximately 3cm in length and the sterling silver bezel takes a  round cabochon.

Available in 8mm, 10mm and 12mm (this refers to the internal bezel size).  The depth is approximately 1mm (or 2.5mm for the deeper bezel styles). These earrings are sold by the pair and each pair comes with 2 pieces of crystal clear glass cabochons to fit.

name: Vintage Style Oval Pendant Trays for 18x25mm glass
description:
New antique style pendants will be excellent in all your vintage bijoux creations - very Marie Antoinette!  They take oval glass cabochons measuring 18x25mm whereas the pendant itself measures approximately 30x40mm.  

These pendants are made of a zinc alloy and they come in four colours, antique silver, old gold, antique bronze and vintage copper.   They are sold in packs of 10.  The glass is not included in this listing but is available separately.

name: Domed Wooden Circles 38mm (1.5inch)
description:
Another gorgeous new product - these beautiful wooden circles that fit our 38mm pendant trays perfectly, or you could just use them with a bail.  And the best thing is, they are domed!!  That's right people, these wooden big babies have a beautifully rounded top!  They measure 9mm at their highest point, tapering to 3mm at the edges.

They are beautifully smooth, and need no more preparation before you add your own finishing touches.  You may want to stain them, paint them, decoupage them and glue things to them, but having seen the gorgeous wood grain patterns they display, we won't be surprised if you prefer to sit and stare at them for a little while.

Each pack contains 10 domed wooden circles.

They are made of birch wood from sustainable forests.

I can tell we will be using these new favourites rather a lot in the coming weeks!  

If you prefer flat circles, we also stock those in several sizes - see separate listings.

name: Epoxy Stickers for Scrabble Tiles - 18x21mm
description:
Our crafting days have officially just got easier.  No more need to battle with bubbles, these little gems fit beautifully over our wooden letter tiles to create the most amazing finish on Scrabble-style jewellery.  

And if that was not enough, the best thing, we think is that from start to finish, it takes as little as a minute to make a pendant!

Flexible epoxy resin stickers are clear, durable, non-yellowing, dimensional, flexible, unbreakable, scratch-proof, and water resistant.  They are also already coated with a strong adhesive, so you can just peel and stick to any image.  Ideal for making your own jewellery, magnets, home decor etc.

The effect is wonderful - they are slightly domed so they add a slight dimensional effect on the pictures underneath.  They are completely clear so will show your images with exactly the same amount of clarity and crispness as the glass, and they are true to colour.   

Once the sticker is adhered to your image, you just need to cut around it and glue it into place using ModPodge or E6000 (but for this last one, please ensure the paper is sufficiently thick otherwise the glue may permeate through the image).   

These stickers are about 2mm high.

Please note that whilst the epoxy domes themselves are waterproof, the adhesive is not, and water resistance of your final piece depends ultimately on the graphics and glues you use, so if they are intended to be for jewellery I would always advise my customers to keep these items away from water as much as possible, and certainly never use them for swimming or in the shower!

This listing is for 10 epoxy stickers measuring 18x21mm, not quite square, but nearly!  Illustration shows the epoxy stickers used on the wooden letter tiles we have in the shop - these are not included in this sale but are available separately.  Other scrabble tiles may have different sizes so ensure you measure yours first!

Try them, we guarantee you will be wowed by their fabness!



(image credit to Download - http://www.etsy.com/shop/download)

name: Crystal Clear Square Glass Tiles 16x16mm
description:
What a fantastic new size - these 16mm by 16mm by 4mm square glass tiles are the ideal size for so many projects, not too small for a necklace, and not too big for earrings.  With just a bail they make beautiful diddy pendants or glue them onto pad cufflink blanks to smarten up the men in your life.  

These beautiful glass pieces have a magnifying effect on the images they sit over so your graphics will come alive.

Available in packs of 10 or 100 tiles.

name: Letter Openers - Silver Tone or Antique Bronze
description:
Wow - these will make a lovely handmade gift for someone!  

Beautiful, solid metal letter openers that come with two oval glass cabochons, ready for you to attach to your own pictures.  Available in either silver tone or antique bronze.

These letter openers are double-sided, they hold two glass cabochons, one on each side.  Once positioned onto the letter opener, each cab will be framed by a row of tiny serrated teeth along the edge of the bezel tray on the letter opener.

The glass cabochons supplied measure 35x55mm, a non standard glass size.  The letter openers measure 185x38mm.

Available individually or in packs of 10 openers.  

Please note some of these letter openers have plain trays and some have trays with holes in them, made during the manufacturing process.  But as you will be covering both sides with a glass cabochon, neither type will affect the final look of your letter opener.  If you have a preference, however, please let us know and we will try our best to send you your preferred option if available.

name: Ball Chain Necklaces 2.4mm 24in/60cm, Sold Singly - Many Colours Available!
description:
This listing is for individual ball chains available in several colour and finishes.  They measure 2.4mm thick, so will be fine in all but our smallest flower bails (for those, please consider the tiny 1mm ball chains listed separately).  The chains come already made up as 60cm/24in long necklaces, but if you would like them shorter, they can be cut to size easily with strong scissors or wire cutters.  They come with little tube clasps.

If you require larger quantities please look at our separate listings for packs of chains.

Colours could be any mix of silver, antique bronze, gunmetal black, vintage copper, gold, green, pink, purple, orange and blue.  

Take your pick!

name: Domed Wooden Circles 25mm (1 inch)
description:
Another gorgeous new product - these beautiful wooden circles that fit our 25mm pendant trays perfectly, or you could just use them with a bail.  And the best thing is, they are domed!!  That's right people, these wooden babies have a beautifully rounded top!  They measure 6mm at their highest point, tapering to 2.5mm at the edges.

They are beautifully smooth, and need no more preparation before you add your own finishing touches.  You may want to stain them, paint them, decoupage them and glue things to them, but having seen the gorgeous wood grain patterns they display, we won't be surprised if you prefer to sit and stare at them for a little while.

Each pack contains 10 domed wooden circles.

They are made of birch wood from sustainable forests.

I can tell we will be using these new favourites rather a lot in the coming weeks!  

If you prefer flat circles, we also stock those in several sizes - see separate listings.

name: Crystal Clear Epoxy Stickers, 24x48mm Rectangles
description:
These lovely rectangular stickers measuring 24x48mm are perfect in our rectangle trays of the same size.  They make great pendants when you prefer a change from glass cabochons or need to make something quickly. They are ideal for last-minute presents!  Perfect for keyrings, bag charms and all sorts of pieces that will swish around and require a less fragile finish.

They measure 24x48mm and are approximately 2mm high, and they are totally clear, and will not yellow or distort your images.

These stickers are sold in packs of 10.

They are self-adhering, so to make your own unique pieces of jewellery all you need to do is pop them over your chosen image and glue this into your preferred tray.

name: Wooden Circle Tiles 19mm (3/4 inch)
description:
And here we have the little sister to the popular wooden circles we sell, these flat circle tiles measure a diddy 19mm.  They can be painted, decoupaged, embellished and glazed, pyrographed, drilled, quilted, hewn, whittled and sculpted, and the list goes on and on.  They also provide a good base onto which you can mount your creations that use other media - say, embroidery for example.

They measure 3/4 inch/19mm in diameter and just over 3mm tall.

Please note these tiles are slightly too big for our 18mm pendant trays and stickers but we will look out for some new components to fit these lovelies.  

Each pack contains 10 wooden circle tiles.

They are made of solid birch wood from renewable and managed sources.  They have been sanded to make them smooth and comfortable to wear.  We want no splinters here!

Try making your own magnets to give as presents, or you could decorate one side finishing it with a layer of Diamond Glaze for a glossy resin-like look and then simply glue a bail on the back. They are a really nice size for cufflinks too!

Show us what you make on our Facebook page @ Jasmin Studio Crafts!

name: Earstud Blanks with 4mm or 8mm Pad
description:
Super useful item for your bag of jewellery making tricks!  

These fab silver plated earstud blanks are sold in packs of 10 pairs and come with matching butterfly backs.  

They are lead and nickel free and feature a pad measuring either 4mm or 8mm for you to glue on your choice of item. The tiny 4mm one is good for our smallest glass pieces including the teeny hearts and the 6mm baby cabochons! 

We had fun coming up with some ideas (bear with us, we did get a bit carried away at one point):

- use some of the more fancy glass shapes such as little hearts, teardrops and stars
- small flatback gemstones
- polymer clay mini-sculptures
- polymer clay cane slices
- shrink plastic cut outs using photos, vintage images or kids' drawings, seal them well!
- buttons, either ready made or look at our fabric button making kit so you can make your own 
- game pieces: try scrabble tiles or other more unusual moulded pieces
- tiny toys (Christmas cracker penny toys, playmobile/lego/barbie/anything-in-my-pocket pieces, 
- dollshouse items (we've seen some adorable cups and saucers and plates of yummy looking food in both 1:12 and 1:24 scale that would be fab here)
- objects found in nature - try tiny rounds of sawn branches, unusual seedpods (you should varnish these well), small fancy pebbles
- metal cogs, small nuts and bolts
- felted balls 
- cut outs of sheet felt (try layering different colours)
- make your own teeny organza flowers 

The choice is endless!

name: Crystal Clear Epoxy Stickers, 30x40mm Oval
description:
These lovely oval stickers measuring 30x40mm are perfect in our oval trays of the same size.  They make great pendants when you prefer a change from glass cabochons or need to make something quickly. They are ideal for last-minute presents!  Perfect for keyrings, bag charms and all sorts of pieces that will swish around and require a less fragile finish.

They measure 30x40mm and are approximately 2mm high, and they are totally clear, and will not yellow or distort your images.

These stickers are sold in packs of 6 (ideal for the bracelets) or 10.

They are self-adhering, so to make your own unique pieces of jewellery all you need to do is pop them over your chosen image and glue this into your preferred tray.

name: Acrylic Large Oval Bracelet 30x40mm - Now Also in Silver!
description:
We love these new bracelets!  They are smooth, polished, shiny, solid, and very very tactile - we dare you to try wearing one without fiddling with it all the time!  You have six opportunities to show off your pretty pictures on six separate bezels of a huge 30x40mm each.     

These bracelets are available in black and now also in silver colour and either on their own so you can glue on your own work, or with stickers that fit perfectly into the bezels (available in the epoxy sticker section of our shop - look for 30x40mm ovals).   Glass can be used too (also available separately), but please note glass makes these bracelets a little heavy, and as the bezels go all the way round your wrist, you will have to be careful not to knock and potentially crack the glass on your bracelet.  

To use the stickers, simply place the sticker over your preferred image, cut around it and glue into the bezel using ModPodge or E6000.  

These bracelets are elasticated so will fit most wearers, however they are a tight fit - they were not designed to bounce around your wrist.  If do you find the fit slightly too tight, or if you are making some for sale and so would prefer to have a range of sizes, we would recommend restringing the bezels on elastic stringing material with a small bead in between each bezel tray.

We guarantee total love for these bracelets!  A firm favourite.

**Please note stickers are no longer supplied with this item but they are available separately, look for 30x40mm oval stickers in our epoxy sticker section or glass in our oval glass section.  You will need 6 glass pieces or stickers per bracelet**

name: Crystal Clear Epoxy Stickers, 22x30mm Oval
description:
These lovely oval stickers measuring 22x30mm are perfect in our oval trays of the same size.  They make great pendants when you prefer a change from glass cabochons or need to make something quick - but because the finished article is unbreakable and 'kinda all-terrain', they are ideal for keyrings, bag charms and all sorts of pieces that will swish around and require a less fragile finish.

They measure 22x30mm and are approximately 2mm high, and they are totally clear, and will not yellow or distort your images.

These stickers are sold in packs of 10.

They are self-adhering, so to make your own unique pieces of jewellery all you need to do is pop them over your chosen image and glue this into your preferred tray.

name: 22x30mm Oval Glass Cabochons
description:
Lovely crystal clear glass cabochons that fit perfectly in our new 22x30 pendant trays.  

These glass pieces are beautifully smooth and will do wonders to enhance any image that you choose to pop underneath.  Simply glue to a sealed image using Diamond Glaze and see your pictures pop!

The cabs are about 4.5mm high.  They are sold in packs of 10 pieces.

name: 22x30mm Oval Pendant Trays
description:
Fab new size, not too big, not too small, for those of us who are happy to be in the middle.  These lovely oval trays measure 22x30mm (internally), and are perfect for the new glass and stickers of the same size.

Total external dimensions are 25x39. The bail opening measures 3.7x5.1mm, and the tray is a fraction under 2mm deep.

These are currently available in a lovely bright silver plated finish and we hope to stock more colours in the near future.

Sold in packs of 10 pieces, and like all our items, these are also nickel and lead free.

name: Bottle Caps - Perfect for Magnets!
description:
We have been having fun with these, making our own magnets for the fridge!  

These bottle caps are brand new and especially made for us crafters, they are not rejects from some recycling plant and, no, they do not smell of drink!

They measure 1 inch internally (that's just over 25mm), and externally they are 32m wide and 6.5mm high.

They go perfectly with our 25mm stickers and glass so now you can make the coolest magnets ever!  We have fridge magnets of several types on different listings - check them out!

Bottle caps are sold in packs of 10 or 100 pieces.

name: Silver Plated Heart Link Bracelet, with Optional Stickers
description:
So, so pretty!  We have had our eye on these bracelets for some time and we are now very excited to be able to offer them in the shop!

Five lovely little hearts make up the links in the chain, with a toggle clasp at the end.  

The hearts measure 20mm across and 2mm deep, so these bracelets will be perfect for resin or polymer clay work.  

Please note these bracelets are 19.5cm (7.5in) long so may not be long enough for bigger wrists (however they can be easily lengthened by adding a piece of chain to the toggle clasp).  Please note the last two rings on the toggle are decorative only and will not hold the bracelet securely.

Available in silver plated finish, individually or in packs of 10.

options.name: 1 x Heart Link Bracelet with Stickers
10 x Heart Link Bracelets with Stickers

name: Square Craft Punch 0.45in/12mm
description:
An essential item if you plan to make a lot of jewellery, this is a quality craft punch made by Woodware, a leading UK craft company. These punches have a removable bottom lid so that you can see exactly where you are cutting, and the lever punch makes them even easier to use.  They cut cleanly with no fuzzy edges.

The square cutout measures approximately 0.45 inch - about 12mm per side - so it is ideal for our 12mm square glass.   

You will love these punches!

name: Little Flip-top Tin
description:
Fab new box for presenting your gifts - a hinged flip-top tin that is big enough for most of our pendants (it will hold all but our rectangular tray).

The tin measures 62x50x20mm externally (55x43x14mm internally) and has a slightly domed top.

Useful and pretty.

name: Circle Craft Punch 0.6in/16mm
description:
An essential item if you plan to make a lot of pendants, this circle punch will make your production line flow! Even if you just make the odd pendant here and there, don't we know how difficult it is to cut an accurate circle? If you're anything like me you can use all the templates you like, but a circle still comes out as a collection of straight lines and odd angles that shouldn't be there!

This is a quality craft punch made by Woodware, a leading UK craft company. These punches have a removable bottom lid so that you can see exactly where you are cutting, and the lever punch makes it easier to use.  They cut cleanly with no fuzzy edges.

The circle cutout measures just over 0.6 inch - about 16mm - so it is ideal for our 16mm glass and trays.  Think of all those cufflinks you can now make!

name: Plastic Flower Earring Backs
description:
How many times have we wished we had a spare selection of these?  Haven't we all lost earring backs or bought new hook earrings and wished they just came with something to make them stay on?  

These will definitely help.  Stock up now, as all your friends will want some.

Tiny little plastic earrings backs suitable for most earring wires.  Sold in packs of 20 (10 pairs) or 100 (50 pairs).

name: 10 x Pairs of Earwires - Choose Your Colour!
description:
A staple in the jewellery-maker's bag of tricks, these simple earwires are a must-have!

They measure about 18mm long and the ring opening is approximately 2mm wide.  All you need to do is open the ring with flat nosed pliers, thread your favourite item through the opening, and close the ring again.  

We will soon be listing lots of cabochon settings that can be used directly onto the rings - look out for them!  

The earwires are sold in packs of 10 pairs, and they come in the following colours:

Antique Silver, Silver Plated, Vintage Copper, Antique Bronze, Gold Plated and now also in Gunmetal Black.

Would you like some fasteners too?  look at these fab earring backs - http://www.jasminstudiocrafts.bigcartel.com/product/plastic-flower-earnuts-earring-backs - they are perfect for these earwires!

name: 25mm Heart Pendant Trays - Now also in black and antique silver!
description:
Beautiful heart-shaped trays to fit 1-inch hearts (listed separately).

These heart pendants are absolutely exquisite - lovely quality plating, with a little pattern in the bezel for your glue to grip onto, and a little starburst design at the back - these are our current favourites!

They are available in silver plated, antique bronze and vintage copper- and now also in black and antique silver - all equally beautiful!

The bezel takes a 25mm heart (please note the trays will be a bit big for the 23.5mm we stock, but 25mm hearts are now also listed).  The bail measures 5x5mm.

Available in packs of 10 of the same colour and now you can also choose to mix and match your colours by choosing the appropriate option from the drop down box - please email us your choice of colours otherwise you will be sent our choice from what is available.

Glass sold separately.

options.name: *NEW* 10 of Your Own Mix of Colours - just email us your choice!

name: Earring or Charm Bails Silver or Gold Plated
description:
This listing is for 10 pairs of earring/charm bails - they are made of brass, are free of lead and nickel, and they are available in silver or gold plate.

The difference between these and normal bails is that the ring is across the pad, not perpendicular to it, so they can be joined directly to a set of earwires or with just a jump ring they can be made to dangle from a bracelet, and will hang facing forward.

The pad measures just under 10mm x 6mm, and will fit any of our smaller pieces (**except for the 6 and 8mm glass).  The pictures illustrate how the bails will look with a 15mm glass cabochon.  Please note the earring bails we now sell have a flatter glue pad, with a pattern for secure adhesion.  The backs are beautifully smooth.

Have a look around the shop for lots more items for you to make your own personalised jewellery!

name: Crystal Clear Glass Hearts 12mm
description:
Meet the newest member of the heart glass family - these babies measure a teeny 12mm down and across.  

With this listing you will receive 10 (or 100) glass hearts, domed and perfect, measuring, ideal for Valentine's day but perfect any day for showing off pictures of your loves - be they whomever or whatever they be!

Their weeny size makes them ideal for earrings and rings.

This listing is for a pack of 10 little glass hearts or a large pack of 100.

Shown in the photo next to the 23.5mm big sister.

Buy a few items and pay no more in postage!

name: Teardrop Glass Cabochons 10x14mm
description:
Beautiful new shape, a newcomer in our family of glass - these lovely tiny crystal clear teardrops measure just 10x14mm.  They are 4mm high.

Like the other shapes, these pretty pear glass pieces also have a magnifying effect on the images they sit over so your graphics will come alive.

Available in packs of 10 pieces.

Also available on separate listings, larger teardrops that measure 13x18 and 18x25mm.

name: Clear Window Tin Box
description:
Lovely new gift tin with a clear top so that your creations are visible through the lid.

This is a sizeable box, measuring 65x65x35mm.  It will hold bigger items such as rectangular trays, pill boxes and collections of items.  It is quite deep so you can add your own choice of tissue paper padding to coordinate with your product.

The clear plastic window lid measures 48x48mm which means your items will be clearly visible through it.  These boxes make great display items too, keeping your work protected, yet visible.

Try one out today, we are sure you will love them!

name: Customisable Hair Band - Antique Bronze
description:
Pretty!  Adding to our little range of hair adornments, these brand new hair bands are just gorgeous!  

They are made of iron, antique bronze coated, with double bands just a couple of cm apart that are joined inside a tidy cap.  

These hairbands are smooth, strong and comfortable to wear.

And the best bit is that they have a round pad onto which you can glue all your best designs. The pad measures 20mm in diameter which is wide enough to hold most toppings, even reasonably heavy ones, and also is the perfect size for a 20mm glass cab or sticker.  Though we do like them with a big showy handcrafted fabric flower, like in the picture shown!  

Currently available to buy individually, in an Antique Bronze finish though we hope to be stocking more colours soon.

name: 30mm Round Pendant Trays
description:
Fab new size - we have been wanting to stock 30mm since forever and now they are here in silver plated finish, and soon in a range of colours!

The internal bezel measures 30mm in diameter. The bail opening measures 3.7x5.1mm, and the tray is a fraction under 2mm deep.

Sold in packs of 10 pieces.

These trays are plated cast alloy and like all our items, they are nickel and lead free.

name: Customisable Pill Box
description:
How cute is this!  Lovely little pill boxes with sprung closure and a fixed inner tray with three little compartments, with epoxy stickers to fit over the top so that you can customise your pill box to your own designs.  

The box measures approximately 50 x 25mm, and the sticker measures 42mm.  

One epoxy sticker is supplied per pill box, but you may buy extras separately.  The stickers are really easy to use, just peel back film, and pop the sticker onto your chosen image starting at one end and pressing down as you go until your entire image is behind the sticker, then trim the edges of the paper, and voila! pill box topping's made!  You can then glue down the topping onto your pill box using ModPodge or a stronger glue.

Available individually or in sets of 10 pill boxes and stickers.

name: Crystal Clear Epoxy Stickers, 25x50mm Rectangles
description:
We love our epoxy stickers!  These completely clear epoxy stickers serve pretty much the same purpose as our glass pieces - they make your images pop!  however, these are made of a flexible epoxy resin that is clear, durable, non-yellowing, dimensional, flexible, unbreakable, scratch-proof, and water resistant - and if that was not enough, they are also already coated with a strong adhesive, so you do not need to glue them onto your artwork with any glaze, you just peel and stick.   

The effect is wonderful - they are slightly domed so they have a dimensional effect on the pictures underneath.  They are completely clear (even the glittery ones) so will show your images with exactly the same amount of clarity and crispness as the glass, and they are true to colour.   

Once the sticker is adhered to your image, you just need to cut around it and glue it into place in any pendant blank.   Please note that the dome is about 2-3mm high - if you are used to our glass pieces, you may find that the stickers do not protrude as much as the glass, so you may want to use a lower edge bezel tray. 

They are available in several shapes and sizes, either completely clear or with a light sprinkling of glitter.   All equally beautiful, so try them all and see your projects take off in a new direction!

This listing is for 10 x plain rectangle stickers measuring 25x50mm.  

***IMPORTANT***  Please note this size of sticker is slightly too big for our rectangular trays - most trays have a curved bezel which means the dimensions of the base are slightly smaller than at the top of the bezel, and these stickers need to sit flat against the bottom of the tray.  We do however have some 23.5x47.5 stickers that fit perfectly.

(Please be aware that whilst the epoxy domes themselves are waterproof, the adhesive is not, and water resistance of your final piece depends ultimately on the graphics and glues you use, so I would always advise my customers to keep these items away from water as much as possible, and certainly never use them for swimming or in the shower!)

name: Silver Plated Double Ring with 10x50mm Bezel - non-adjustable
description:
The coolest kid in the ring block!  These fab rings slip over two fingers, over which sits a long 10x50mm bezel.

The rings have been soldered closed so are not adjustable, but will fit a size L/M which is about 17.3mm in diameter.

We do not currently sell glass to fit these trays, but there is so much you can do with them - consider filling them with resin and little beads perhaps, or create a tiny diorama within.  Or how about filling them with brightly coloured polymer clay and stamping them with a favourite word?

Edgy, fabulous and unique.  Guaranteed to stand out!

name: Silver Plated Bangle with 25x50mm Rectangular Bezel
description:
A relative of our popular pad bangle, the same style of open bangle now features a rectangular bezel measuring 25x50mm.  

You can fill the tray with resin or polymer clay or use the bangles in mixed media projects.  

They are easy to slip on over your wrist and comfortable to wear.

Available in silver plated finish.  Round and square bezel bangles available on separate listings.  

Glass to fit this bangle is now available - look for the 25x50mm rectangular glass listing.

name: Silver Plated Bangle with 25mm Square Bezel
description:
A relative of our popular pad bangle, the same style of open bangle now features a square bezel.  You can fill these with resin, polymer clay or a glass tile or gemstone cabochon.  They are easy to slip on over your wrist and comfortable to wear.

Available in silver plated finish.  Round and rectangular bezels available on separate listings.  Please note glass is not included but is available to buy separately - look for 25mm square glass, either domed or flat.

name: Silver Plated Bangle with 25mm Round Bezel
description:
A relative of our popular pad bangle, the same style of open bangle now features a round bezel.  You can fill these with resin, polymer clay or a glass or gemstone cabochon.  They are easy to slip on over your wrist and comfortable to wear.

Available in silver plated finish.  Square and rectangular bezels available on separate listings.  Please note glass is not included but is available to buy separately - look for 25mm round glass, either domed, high domed or flat.

name: Crystal Clear Epoxy Stickers, 18x25mm Oval - Now also in Glittery!
description:
These lovely oval stickers measuring 18x25mm are perfect in our oval trays of the same size.  They make great pendants when you prefer a change from glass cabochons or need to make something quick - but because the finished article is unbreakable and 'kinda all-terrain', they are ideal for keyrings, bag charms and all sorts of pieces that will swish around and require a less fragile finish.

They measure 18x25mm and are approximately 2mm high, and they are totally clear, and will not yellow or distort your images.

Sold in packs of 10 stickers, in your choice of plain or a light sprinkling of glitter embedded into the sticker.

They are self-adhering, so to make your own unique pieces of jewellery all you need to do is pop them over your chosen image and glue this into your preferred tray.

name: Circle Craft Punch 1.5in/38mm
description:
An essential item if you plan to make a lot of pendants, this circle punch will make your production line flow!  Even if you just make the odd pendant here and there, don't we know how difficult it is to cut an accurate circle?  If you're anything like me you can use all the templates you like, but a circle still comes out as a collection of straight lines and odd angles that shouldn't be there! 

This is a quality craft punch made by Woodware, a leading UK craft company.  These punches have a removable bottom lid so that you can see exactly where you are cutting, and the lever punch makes it easier to use.

The circle cutout measures 1.5 inches/38mm, so it is perfect for using with our 38mm glass and trays.

name: Square Craft Punch 1in/25.4mm
description:
An essential item if you plan to make a lot of pendants, this square punch will quickly become a favourite, especially if your work is with patterned paper.  These punches have a removable bottom lid so that you can see exactly where you are cutting, and the lever punch makes it easier to use.
 
This is a quality craft punch made by Woodware, a leading UK craft company.

The cutout measures 1 inch per side, so it is slightly bigger than the 25mm glass and trays, however it is a useful guide and you can easily file around the paper once it is glued to the glass - or try using a sharp blade to just 'shave' the excess paper.  Much easier than cutting a good square in the first instance we think!

name: Circle Craft Punch 1in/25.4mm
description:
An essential item if you plan to make a lot of pendants, this circle punch will make your production line flow!  Even if you just make the odd pendant here and there, don't we know how difficult it is to cut an accurate circle?  If you're anything like me you can use all the templates you like, but a circle still comes out as a collection of straight lines and odd angles that shouldn't be there! 

This is a quality craft punch made by Woodware, a leading UK craft company.  These punches have a removable bottom lid so that you can see exactly where you are cutting, and the lever punch makes it easier to use.

The circle cutout measures 1 inch, so it is very slightly bigger than the 25mm glass and trays, however we find the difference (0.4mm) is so tiny it is hardly noticeable and the cutouts can be used perfectly well with our 25mm items.

name: Make Your Own Fabric Buttons!  22mm Self-Cover Buttons
description:
Add a new creative twist to your jewellery with these lovely button making kits.  

You start with two pieces of metal and end up with a beautiful button that is covered in the fabric of your choice.  

These buttons measure 22mm and are available in two versions:  flat back and wire back.  The flat back buttons are ideal for gluing onto rings, earrings, hair pins and pendant findings, and the wire back buttons are perfect for stringing and for threading onto hairbands.  

These buttons are offered with the option of a making tool for assembling your buttons (you only need to purchase it once for buttons of the same size).

To make your pretty buttons just pick some fabric – thin fabric is best – and cut a circle that’s about 1-1.5cm wider than your button.  Pop the fabric onto the white part of the tool, pattern-side facing down, and sit your button over this, ensuring that any pattern is centered in the position you want it to be (this can sometimes be a bit tricky!), and then with the red bit of the tool, press down into the white bit so that the fabric and button top are snug inside the white part of the tool.  Bunch the fabric back into the button and finally, place the back of the button on top, ensuring it is perfectly centered, and with the red bit of the tool again press down hard so that it fits right inside the button.  Finally, pop the button out by pressing onto the flat side of the tool, and there you go, a perfect button that you have made yourself!

Check our blog entry for instructions with pictures:  http://jasminstudiocrafts.blogspot.com/2011/09/make-your-own-buttons.html

Available in packs of 10 or 100, each pack is supplied with a making tool as an option.   We also have other size buttons on separate listings.

name: Sterling Silver Charm or Pendant Blanks - many sizes!
description:
Beautiful new charm blanks ranging in size from a tiny 8mm to a sizeable 15mm, these little blanks have many uses such as charm blanks for a customised bracelet or pendant blanks to wear around your neck - for an up-to-the-minute look, consider combining a few, in different sizes, on a necklace chain, maybe to spell out a favourite word or as a collage of complementary images.  However you use them, they will be great.

These trays have been hallmarked with our maker's mark as registered at the London Assay Office.

They are available to buy individually, in the following sizes:

- 8mm (approx 1mm depth)
- 10mm (approx 1mm depth)
- 12mm (approx 1mm depth)
- 15mm (approx 1mm depth) 
- 15mm (deep bezel: approx 2.5mm depth)
- 18mm (approx 1mm depth)

Each charm purchased comes with a glass cabochon to fit.

Please bear in mind that the prices of our silver items are subject to the fluctuations of the market.

name: Crystal Clear Domed Round Glass Cabochons 12mm
description:
Beautiful crystal clear domed glass cabochons.  These beautiful glass pieces have a magnifying effect on the images they sit over so your graphics will come alive.

This listing is for a pack of of 10 or 100 glass cabochons measuring 12mm across.

Shown in the photos used with the 12mm rings and earrings available separately from the shop, or you can glue them directly to a flat pad finding.

To use for jewellery, just coat your images with Mod Podge to seal and once dry glue to the glass with Diamond Glaze.  Another layer of Diamond Glaze over the back will help protect your image.  Allow the piece to dry flat for a few hours, or even better, overnight, then glue the glass to your jewellery blank and you're all set! The glass will really make your images pop!

Also available in other shapes and sizes.

Please see other listings in my shop for all the items you will need to make beautiful jewellery and accessories.  I have lots of bails, pendant blanks, Chiyogami papers, E6000 glue, Judikins Diamond Glaze and much much more!

Happy making!

name: Make Your Own Fabric Buttons!  19mm Self-Cover Buttons
description:
Add a new creative twist to your jewellery with these lovely button making kits.  

You start with two pieces of metal and end up with a beautiful button that is covered in the fabric of your choice.  

These buttons measure 19mm and are available in two versions:  flat back and wire back.  The flat back buttons are ideal for gluing onto rings, earrings, hair pins and pendant findings, and the wire back buttons are perfect for stringing and for threading onto hairbands.

Finally, pop the button out by pressing onto the flat side of the tool, and there you go, a perfect button that you have made yourself!

Check our blog entry for instructions with pictures:  http://jasminstudiocrafts.blogspot.com/2011/09/make-your-own-buttons.html

Available in packs of 10 or 100, each pack is supplied with a making tool as an option.   We also have many other sizes on separate listings.

name: Silver Plated Spring Bangle with 25mm Bezel or Pad
description:
Lovely bangle now also available with a round pad for your choice of topping!

To use, you pull the bangle and it opens under the bezel - the hinge is on the opposite side which would sit under the wrist.  This is a lovely, strong, quality item that is sure to show off your best work.

They are available with either a round 25mm bezel or pad.  The bezel would be used with round glass and stones, and the pad can be used with any choice of item that you would like to show off - perhaps felt flowers or a big polymer clay sculpture!

Available in silver plated, individually or in lots of 10 bangles.

Please note this item no longer comes with glass, but you can order your choice of glass separately under the glass listings in the shop.

The photo on the left shows the item with the serrated bezel only.

name: 10mm Earstud Bezel Blanks - Various Colours!
description:
Gorgeous earring set for you to make your own glass tile jewellery!

Includes earstuds with 10mm bezel cup and matching butterfly backs.  The earrings are made of plated brass and are lead and nickel free.

This listing is for one pack of 10 pairs of earrings.  

**IMPORTANT NOTE** 
Please be aware glass cabochons are no longer included in this listing, but are available separately. Please look for 10mm round glass cabochons or 10mm round resin stickers to ensure a good fit.  And please remember that the earrings are sold in packs of 10 pairs, so you will need 20 glass pieces or stickers!

These earstuds are ideal for using with resin, polymer clay, gemstones and glass cabochons. For use with glass cabochons you will require a completely clear glaze to ensure the image shows through clearly under the glass - Diamond Glaze, available on a separate listing, is ideal for this. Remember to coat any image well with sealant or decoupage glue before applying the glaze so that the colours do not run. Always test your paper before making up the final piece.

You can choose any of the following colours, all in a beautiful plating: 

- Silver plated
- Gold plated
- Antique Bronze
- Vintage Copper

Various other types of earring blanks are available - see other listings in the earrings section of the shop!

You can make beautiful jewellery for presents, and the re-sell value of the finished earrings is huge!  And yet, they will cost you only pennies per pair plus the cost of some glue and a bit of paper to make.  :)

Please see other listings in the shop for all the items you will need to make beautiful jewellery and accessories.  We have lots of bails, pendant blanks, Chiyogami papers, E6000 glue, Judikins Diamond Glaze and much much more!

Happy making!

name: Split Rings for Keyrings - many colours!
description:
Now we know the secret to making the easiest keyrings in the world, why not stock up on a few of these, a pack or two of pendants and some epoxy stickers and spend an afternoon making gifts for your favourite people? 

These rings are available in silver, antique silver, gold, old gold, antique bronze, vintage copper, gunmetal black and steel, round or oval (this last only in steel colour) 

The round rings in all colours except steel measure 24mm in internal diameter, 28mm externally.  The steel round rings measure 20.5mm in internal diameter, 24.5mm externally, and the steel oval rings measure 22x30mm internally and 28x35mm externally.  

Each pack contains 10 x split rings.

options.name: 10 x Round Antique Silver Split Rings
10 x Round Old Gold Split Rings
10 x Round Vintage Copper Split Rings
10 x Round Gunmetal Black Split Rings

name: Ring Blanks for 12mm Cabochon - Silver, Bronze and now in Vintage Copper
description:
The littlest cabochon rings in the shop, these take a diddy 12mm cab, and as such are slimmer and lighter than the other cabochon rings we sell, but as they are adjustable they will fit most.

These rings are available individually or in value packs of 10 in silver plated, antique bronze or vintage copper and all feature a double wire ring band which supports a 12mm bezel.  Please note glass is not included.  Ring diameter is 16mm. 

**IMPORTANT NOTE** 
Please be aware glass cabochons are not included in this listing, but are available separately. Please look for 12mm Round Glass Cabochons or 12mm Epoxy Stickers to ensure a good fit.

These rings are ideal for using with resin, polymer clay, gemstones and glass cabochons.  Our 12mm glass cabs available separately, will show any image at its best - the beautiful glass cabochons will make your pictures pop, so the pairing with the rings makes for a gorgeous combination to take your jewellery making on a new creative direction.  Or consider trying our new 12mm epoxy stickers for a super-easy, super-quick make!

To use these rings with glass you need to do is find a suitable image, seal it well with a decoupage type glue, apply a clear glaze over the glass (Diamond Glaze, available in the shop, works well for this) and press it down onto your image.  When this is dry, a bit more glaze will stick the glass image down into the bezel.

Please bear in mind that bronze and copper finishes will react with the glaze to give your images a blue tint.  To avoid this happening, please coat the inside of the ring bezel well with your sealing medium.

And just a note about the variance in the pieces.  With these smaller sizes of glass even a small variance in size will be crucial - as with all other manufactured items, there is a small percentage of tolerance in both the glass and the metal parts and this can mean that a slightly-bigger-than-usual glass piece will struggle to fit into a slightly-smaller-than-usual bezel.  Normally a gentle push will click the glass into position, but if you have any problems do not hesitate to contact us for advice.

name: 18mm Round Pendant Trays in Silver, Bronze and Copper
description:
Brand new - 18mm pendant trays for your pretty pictures!  These gorgeous trays will house an 18mm glass cabochon beautifully, so now your smaller pieces of jewellery can also have a professional finish.

They are made of zinc alloy and are lead and nickel free.  They are available in silver plated, antique bronze and vintage copper.

Glass is not included in this listing but is available separately from the shop.

This listing is for 10 pendant trays.

We'd love to see your makes - why not share your pictures with us @ Jasmin Studio Crafts on Facebook

name: Large Pointy Hearts for Resins or Altered Art - Silver, Bronze or Copper!
description: We're so excited about these beautiful hearts - they offer so many possibilities! Available in antique silver, antique bronze or vintage copper - they are large "pointy" hearts, measuring 52x30mm at their widest, good for both jewellery and decoration. The 3mm deep bezel will be ideal for you to fill with your choice of images and elements, and will be perfect for altered art and steampunk pieces, as they can to hold most embellishments. Please note that the antique silver trays are shallower at 1.5mm and a fraction smaller all around. We now have stickers to fit these hearts - see our listing here. They would make perfect pieces of statement jewellery although we can see them hanging from the Jasmin Studio Christmas tree this year! Sold in packs of 2.

name: Split Rings 5mm - Different Colours Available
description:
Useful little split rings, available in silver plated, gold plated, antique copper or antique bronze, ideal for making your own keyrings, or simply to obtain a secure attachment for a charm onto a chain.

They measure just over 5mm and are available in packets of approximately 100.  

We offer a low flat postage rate of £2.50 for all UK purchases!

name: Tiny Resin Cherry Blossoms - Choose a Colour!
description:
We have been coveting these for sooo long - they are just exquisite!  Teeny tiny resin flowers measuring just 9mm, in a rainbow of colours.  

These little flowers are flatbacked meaning that you can glue them to most things (we can recommend E6000 for this, great glue!).  Their uses don't just stop at jewellery - we have used them for scrapbooking, to decorate handmade birthday cards and even to decorate birthday presents!

See last picture for a clear numbered list of available colours - if you double click on it, it will be much kinder to your eyes!

These little cherry blossoms come in packs of 10 flowers in one colour.  Please note this listing is for 10 flowers of THE SAME COLOUR.  

(Mixed packs will be available on a separate listing, as well as a rainbow pack of ALL the colours in one pack!)  

Choose from:  

1.	Plaster White 
2.	Light Dove Grey
3.	Ice Blue
4.	Acqua - sorry not available
5.	Sky 
6.	Lavender
7.	Orchid Mauve
8.	Baby Pink
9.	Fuschia 
10.	Raspberry 
11.	Strawberry 
12.	Sorbet Pink
13.	Ice Pink  - sorry not available
14.	Pink Lace 
15.	Pale Salmon 
16.	Salmon 
17.	Old Rose 
18.	Port Rose
19.	Milk Chocolate
20.	Dark Chocolate
21.	Black
22.	Apricot
23.	Fudge
24.	Sesame  - sorry not available
25.	Mustard
26.	Green Apple
27.	Light Forest Green
28.	Celery
29.	Eau de Nil - sorry not available

name: Crystal Clear Flat Round Glass Tiles 25mm
description:
A set of gorgeous clear glass round tiles, superb quality just like my cabochons, but the difference is that these are flat, not domed.  

They will still make your images pop, and they will look great as jewellery or magnets.  

They measure 25mm in diameter and about 4mm in height.  

These are just the right size for our 25mm pendant trays!

Sold in packs of 10 or 100 pieces.

Please check our other listings for lots more items to make your own beautiful jewellery!

name: Hook Earrings with Pad - Silver or Gold Plated
description:
Sometimes you just need a jewellery component that covers many eventualities - this earring finding is it!  A beautifully finished plated hook earring with an 8mm pad so that you can glue onto it, um, anything you like!  You can add any of your glass cabochon and glass tile creations (except perhaps for those made using the very tiny hearts and stars), you can use resin flowers, recycled vintage finds, polymer clay shapes or beaded makes - absolutely anything goes!

They are made of brass that is either gold or silver plated, and measure 15mm long.  The pad measures 8mm in diameter and has been soldered to 0.9mm wire. The wire is reasonably flexible so if you prefer a bigger or smaller hook, you can flex it to your requirement - this also means that if they get slightly twisted in transit, they can be easily bent back to shape, and the soldered joint is strong. 

The last picture shows the back of the earring hook, used with a 16mm heart cabochon.

Sold in packs of 10 pairs - each pack will come with plastic earnuts for safe wearing.

We are keen to see what you make with these, please share your photos on our Facebook page @ Jasmin Studio Crafts.

name: Pick your Own Letter Tiles - Just like Scrabble!  Now available in BIGGER packs!
description:
Lovely wooden tiles, measuring 18 x 21 mm, for you to make up your own names!  With this listing you get to choose exactly the letters you want, and you can either buy them individually or in quantities of 10, 50 or 100 (simply email us your choice of letters if you would like the bigger quantities).

If you don't mind so much which letters you receive, we also sell random packs of 10 and 100 on a separate listing.

They are not Scrabble brand, but they are similar to Scrabble in size, feel & quality.   (Please note UK Scrabble tiles measure about 18.5 per side, these are American size and measure approximately 18x21mm). 

If you want multiples of one letter, just add it to your basket and you will be able to amend the quantity afterwards.  If you don't see your favourite letter listed, please get in touch and we'll try and find it for you.

These are top quality letter tiles made of wood, flat at the back, very smooth and brand new, never played with!   They have no jagged edges making them ideal for pendants.  Just add a glue-on a bail and an image on the top and cover with Diamond Glaze for a beautiful, personalised piece of stylish jewellery, or look out for our new epoxy stickers to match, now in the shop!

***please note we currently have no letter R available but expect these again by mid-December***

options.name: Pick Your Own 10 Tiles (email us your choice)
Pick Your Own 50 Tiles (email us your choice)
Pick Your Own 100 Tiles (email us your choice)
Individual letters 50p each. Please pick below

name: Crystal Clear 30x40mm Domed Oval Glass Cabochon
description:
Beautiful oval clear glass domed cabochons, measuring a sizeable 30x40mm.

This listing is for a pack of 10 gorgeous chunky oval cabs.

These are top quality completely clear glass cabochons, very smooth, shiny and totally see-through.  They a have a magnifying effect on the patterns they sit on so they will make your images jump!  

They have safe rounded edges, making them ideal for pendants. Try them with our pendant trays!

Please see other listings in my shop for all the items you will need to make beautiful jewellery and accessories. 

We offer a low £2.50 flat shipping rate within the UK - buy more and don't pay any more in postage!

name: Oval Pendant Trays 18x25mm - All the Colours!
description:
Brand new to the shop, oval trays measuring 18x25mm to accommodate your glass cabochon art.  

These gorgeous trays are made of zinc alloy, are lead and nickel free and fit our 18x25mm glass perfectly.  They are a lovely quality, with even finish, a textured bezel so that your artwork or perhaps a gemstone cabochon can be glued down securely.  The back is also textured with a starburst effect that adds more interest to the piece.  

They are available in packs of 10 in silver plated, antique bronze and vintage copper finishes, and now also in antique silver and black.  All equally lovely!

name: Crystal Clear Epoxy Stickers, 13x18mm Oval - Now also in Glittery!
description:
These completely clear epoxy stickers serve pretty much the same purpose as my glass pieces - they make your images pop!  however, these are made of a flexible epoxy resin that is clear, durable, non-yellowing, dimensional, flexible, unbreakable, scratch-proof, and water resistant - and if that was not enough, they are also already coated with a strong adhesive, so you do not need to glue them onto your artwork with any glaze, you just peel and stick.   

The effect is wonderful - they are slightly domed so they have a dimensional effect on the pictures underneath.  They are completely clear so will show your images with exactly the same amount of clarity and crispness as the glass, and they are true to colour.   

Once the sticker is adhered to your image, you just need to cut around it and glue it into place in any bezel setting.   Please note that the dome is about 2-3mm high - if you are used to my glass pieces, you may find that the stickers do not protrude as much as the glass, so you may want to use a lower edge bezel tray.

Sold in packs of 10 stickers, in your choice of plain or a light sprinkling of glitter embedded into the sticker.

Please note that whilst the epoxy domes themselves are waterproof, the adhesive is not, and water resistance of your final piece depends ultimately on the graphics and glues you use, so I would always advise my customers to keep these items away from water as much as possible, and certainly never use them for swimming or in the shower!

This listing is for 10 oval epoxy stickers measuring 13x18mm.  Illustration shows the epoxy stickers used on the little oval trays as earrings and the oval locket - delicious we think!  Please note however, that this listing is for the stickers only.  All other items shown can be bought separately.

name: Make Your Own Fabric Buttons!  15mm Self-Cover Buttons

Bunch the fabric back into the button and finally, place the back of the button on top, ensuring it is perfectly centered, and with the red bit of the tool again press down hard so that it fits right inside the button.  Finally, pop the button out by pressing onto the flat side of the tool, and there you go, a perfect button that you have made yourself!

Check our blog entry for instructions with pictures:  http://jasminstudiocrafts.blogspot.com/2011/09/make-your-own-buttons.html

Available in packs of 10 or 100, each pack is supplied with a making tool as an option.   We also have many other sizes on separate listings.

name: Crystal Clear Domed Round Glass Cabochons 16mm **FOR 16mm CUFFLINKS and RINGS**
description:
Beautiful crystal clear domed glass cabochons.  These beautiful glass pieces have a magnifying effect on the images they sit over so your graphics will come alive.

These cabochons are the precise size intended for use with our 16mm cufflink, ring, connector and pendant settings.  We have another listing for 16mm cabochons but you may find that those are very slightly too big for the bezel.

This listing is for a pack of of 10 (ten) glass cabochons measuring 16mm across.  Please remember if buying them for cufflinks, that you may need to buy two packs as cufflinks are sold in pairs (so 10 pairs of cufflinks would require 20 pieces of glass, that is two packs of 10).

To use for jewellery, just coat your images with Mod Podge to seal (available from my shop), and once dry glue to the glass with Diamond Glaze.  Another layer of Diamond Glaze over the back will help protect your image.  Allow the piece to dry flat for a few hours, or even better, overnight, then glue the glass to your jewellery blank and you're all set! The glass will really make your images pop!

Also available in other shapes and sizes.

Please see other listings in my shop for all the items you will need to make beautiful jewellery and accessories.  I have lots of bails, pendant blanks, Chiyogami papers, E6000 glue, Judikins Diamond Glaze and much much more!

Happy making!

name: Oval Pendant Trays 30x40mm - Silver, Bronze and Copper Plated
description:
Lovely and tactile large oval trays - you will just want to touch these!  They are beautifully plated and available in three finishes:  Silver Plated, Antique Bronze and Vintage Copper - all equally delicious!

The internal bezel on these trays measures 30x40mm which means they are ideal for the 30x40mm oval glass in the shop.  Their gorgeous large size will make them stand out, so be prepared to receive lots of comments on these!

They are made of a zinc alloy which is then plated in each of the different finishes, and they are lead and nickel free.

This listing is for 10 pendant trays.

We'd love to see what you make with our products, share your photos through Facebook, @ Jasmin Studio Crafts.

name: Make Your Own Fabric Buttons!  12mm Self-Cover Buttons
description:
Add a new creative twist to your jewellery with these lovely button making kits.  

You start with two pieces of metal and end up with a beautiful button that is covered in the fabric of your choice.  

These buttons measure 12mm and are available in two versions:  flat back and wire back.  The flat back buttons are ideal for gluing onto rings, earrings, hair pins and pendant findings, and the wire back buttons are perfect for stringing and for threading onto hairbands.  

These buttons are offered with the option of a making tool for assembling your buttons (you only need to purchase it once for buttons of the same size).

To make your pretty buttons just pick some fabric – thin fabric is best – and cut a circle that’s about 1-1.5cm wider than your button.  Pop the fabric onto the white part of the tool, pattern-side facing down, and sit your button over this, ensuring that any pattern is centered in the position you want it to be (this can sometimes be a bit tricky!), and then with the red bit of the tool, press down into the white bit so that the fabric and button top are snug inside the white part of the tool.  Bunch the fabric back into the button and finally, place the back of the button on top, ensuring it is perfectly centered, and with the red bit of the tool again press down hard so that it fits right inside the button.  Finally, pop the button out by pressing onto the flat side of the tool, and there you go, a perfect button that you have made yourself!

Check our blog entry for instructions with pictures:  http://jasminstudiocrafts.blogspot.com/2011/09/make-your-own-buttons.html

Available in packs of 10 or 100, each pack is supplied with a making tool as an option.   We also have many other sizes on separate listings.
