name: Silver Plated Bracelet - Ideal Blank Canvas for a Charm Bracelet!
description:
This is a gorgeous, sturdy, nickel and lead free bracelet with a very smart chunky toggle clasp - ready to take on any number of charms to make your own charm bracelet.

Pair it with a set of our small 16mm cabochon settings and glass, and a few ready made charms - add your own beads and you will have a totally unique charm bracelet.

(Please note charms & glass are not included in this listing, but are for illustration only)

The bracelet measures 19cm long.

name: Sterling Silver Brooch Pin and Oval Glass
description:
Part of our new range of sterling silver items, this brooch is ideal for making your own personalised present for a special someone!  

The pin brooch features a sterling silver bar and oval cabochon setting to take a 13x18mm oval cabochon.  We include with this listing a lovely clear glass oval cabochon which can sit over any graphic, however you are not limited to that - maybe you could glue in a precious gemstone cabochon for a very very special gift you can make yourself.

Very sturdy and ready to add your own creations.

This item is hallmarked by the London Assay Office.

name: Sterling Silver Bangle with Oval Glass 13x18mm
description:
This is so pretty, and now available in sterling silver!

The bangle is made of sterling silver wire, and the oval tray (also made of sterling silver) serves as a catch.  Once you have completed your cabochon and glued it to the tray you can assemble the piece - all you need to do is tighten the loop on the bangle slightly. In order to do up the bangle for daily wear, the loop on the tray needs to fasten onto the hook on the wire.

If you are used to our silver plated bangle, this sterling silver bangle is slightly smaller and daintier than our plated silver one.  It measures 55mm in diameter.  

This listing includes one bangle (with tray) and one piece of glass to fit.

Please note this item is not hallmarked to allow you to add your own maker's mark if you have one - ask your local Assay Office for details or contact us for more information.

name: Scalloped Round Trays 15mm - Choice of Colours!
description:
Brand new in the shop - these scalloped trays are really very clever.  

You can add your gemstone cab or glass piece, and after you have glued it down, you can either keep the tabs up or press them down to hug the stone or glass.  Not only that, but if you pull back one tab with your jewellery pliers, this serves as a little bail for a jump ring so that you can hang it onto a necklace or bracelet easily for a pretty pendant or charm; and if you pull down two tabs, you have a ready-made connector blank!  You can make an entire bracelet with just these trays, a few jump rings and a clasp!

You can also thread the tab onto an earwire, and there you go, ready made earrings! 

Or, even simpler, just glue a magnet at the back!  Nothing is easier.

Currently available in silver, antique silver, gold plated, antique bronze, vintage copper and black, the internal diameter of these little trays is 15mm, and can be used with our 15mm glass cabochons.

Sold in packs of 10 trays.

(Please note silver tone is not silver plated.  It is also a little bit darker than the usual light silver plated colour, so these are more of a steel colour that goes well both with silver plated and antique silver pieces)

Try them, they're great!

name: Lefranc & Bourgeois Glass Paint Sample Sets
description:
And now your creativity can be fully unleashed!  You have already tried out adding images to your glass, so how about now painting your own designs ONTO the glass?  

These little sample sets of 10 paints, currently available in either transparent or opaque versions, will be great to add your very own art to your glass jewellery pieces.  In fact, it doesn't stop there - you can use these paints on any glass and ceramics, so you could decorate some celebratory champagne glasses or try out making a totally unique tea set!

The paints are self levelling, which means they show fewer brush strokes, and colours are intermixable.   

Bake your finished piece in a domestic oven for 30 mins at 150oC for a piece that is colour fast and dishwasher proof.

Transparent Colours are:  Lemon Yellow, Mandarin, Red, Magenta, Purple, Light Blue, Dark Blue, Light Green, Dark Green, Brown

Opaque Colours are:  White, Black, Brown, Tan, Dark Green, Mid-Green, Dark Blue, Mid-Blue, Yellow, Red

Try a new craft for under £5!  Bargain!!

name: Cern Outliner For Glass Painting - Silver, Gold or Black
description:
Part of the Lefranc & Bourgeois range of paints for fine artists & crafters, we are delighted to welcome this new range of outliners for your glass painting which we believe will complement your personalised jewellery designs beautifully. 

These outliners work by painting directly onto clean glass or ceramics, gently squeezing the tube to create outlines similar to the lead in stained glass windows or tiffany lamps.  These outlines can (once dry) be coloured in with glass paints available in the shop.  

For glass tile jewellery, you can paint either the front or back of the glass - we recommend painting the back of the glass, although it really is your choice (if you paint the front, these outliners will show a slight 3d effect).

After a few days' drying, the piece can be fixed permanently by  baking at 150oC for 30 minutes.

Also available, glass paint sample packs!

name: LARGER SIZE!! Mod Podge Matte or Gloss 16fl oz/473ml
description:
Classic Mod Podge now available in larger sizes (16fl oz/473 ml) in a choice of Matte or Gloss, for your larger projects.

The original Mod Podge formula that’s a glue, sealer and finish all in one!  Use this crafting favorite to decoupage almost anything on wood, glass, terra cotta, metal, canvas and more, then seal with a top coat of Mod Podge. Projects dry to a protective matte or gloss finish.

For or over 40 years, crafters have used Mod Podge® for their most treasured creations. This amazing all-in-one glue, sealer and finish has come along way since its invention in the 1960s and has become a true favorite among crafters of every style and skill level for its versatility, dependability and value. It’s a glue to adhere paper, fabric and other porous materials to almost any surface, it holds tight and dries clear. It’s a sealer that protects decoupage, acrylic paint, stain, fabric and more! It’s a finish that is durable, smooth and fast-drying! Non-toxic with a simple soap and water clean up makes it great for kid's crafts, too.

Original Mod Podge

This listing is for a large 8 fl oz bottle (236ml) of your choice of Matte Mod Podge (the yellow one in the photo) or Gloss Mod Podge (the red one on the right).  

Use it to coat your graphics, images, photographs and Chiyogami to seal before applying Diamond Glaze, or use it as a top coat to decoupaged wooden tiles.  Apply 2 or 3 coats and allow it to dry well between coats.  Remember to always test your graphics first!

Please see other listings in my shop for all the items you will need to make beautiful jewellery and accessories.

name: The Jasmin Studio Crafts Grab Bag
description:
This little grab bag is a welcome addition to our range as it offers great value for any intrepid jewellery maker who likes a surprise!

The grab bags measure approximately 6x10cm or 2.5x4in. 

A typical bag might include:

- A few pendant trays (any mix of sizes, colours and shapes)
- A pair of cufflinks
- A length of chain or a couple of necklaces or chokers
- A ring
- A spoonful of mixed findings and charms and resin flowers
- Half a dozen mixed glass pieces 

Please note that all the pieces are picked blindly so they may differ to the above, the example given is really just an illustration of what could be in one of our grab bags.

The contents will be a colourful mix of jewellery findings, trays, embellishments and glass pieces, to allow you to make around 10 projects.  The contents of the grab bag may be items currently in the store, or they may be end of line or discontinued items or samples, and we may even add in a few extra destash items from our own crafting expeditions.  

Please be aware that the glass may not be an exact fit to your items.  Told you it was going to be a surprise!  However, for the resourceful amongst you, then this won't be a problem.  Got no glass?  fill with resin or polymer clay.  Got glass but no pendant tray?  that's ok, use a bail.  Really stuck?  Contact us for advice.

Please note that the bags will not include any glues, glazes or sealants.

So, get your creative hats on, and away you craft!

name: Square Ring Blanks 25mm - Many Colours
description:
A lovely square ring to take a 25mm glass or gemstone tile or artwork, will allow you to wear your creation on your finger, ready for a view at the flick of a digit!

Glass tiles are not included in this listing, but are available separately. Please look for 25mm Glass Tiles (either domed or flat) to ensure a good fit.

These rings are ideal for using with resin, polymer clay, gemstones and glass tiles. For use with glass tiles you will require a completely clear glaze to ensure the image shows through clearly under the glass - Diamond Glaze, available on a separate listing, is ideal for this. Remember to coat any image well with sealant or decoupage glue before applying the glaze so that the colours do not run. Always test your paper before making up the final piece.  Using just a touch of the Diamond Glaze over your sealed image, you will see your graphics come alive under the magnifying effect of the crystal clear glass.  

The ring band is nice and wide to comfortably hold your topping, and is fully adjustable to your size.  We have two styles of ring band for this ring, both adjustable, but one is closed, one is open - if you have a preference for either, please let us know.

This ring blank is available individually or in economical packs of 10.

name: Watch Parts for Steampunk Jewellery
description:
If you are keen to give your jewellery a steampunk flavour, this is going to be perfect contraption.

This listing is for 5g of various watch parts and will include any mix of gears, pins, movements, faces, dials and such like.   We will make it as varied a mix as possible, but regret we cannot pick individual parts for you - however there will be plenty in each bag to keep you busy.  

This listing is for a small 5g bag - please see all the pictures to get an idea of what 5g looks like.  However please bear in mind that each bag will contain a unique mix of watch parts so they will differ a little from those in the pictures.  To get an idea of scale, see the picture next to a pound coin - the smallest parts measure only a mm or so, so these are tiny!  

To use, we recommend either gluing these to your work, or embedding in resin (if you use Diamond Glaze or DG3, please be prepared to seal all metal parts as DG products can react with base metals and can make the glaze turn blue!).

It's important to note that some of these items are sharp, so please handle carefully.

We'd love to see your creations using our items!  Feel free to post them to our Facebook page:  @ Jasmin Studio Crafts

name: Silver Plated Oval Link Bracelet Blank 13x18mm
description:
Very happy to be able to offer these in the shop!  Lovely silver plated bracelet made up of five oval links that each hold a 13x18mm cabochon - this can be either the glass pieces we sell in the shop, your own polymer clay creations, or a simple resin design - or even a gemstone (13x18mm is a very standard size for gemstone cabochons so you could make your very own semi-precious stone bracelet!)

If you plan to use resin, you should know that the bezel edge is quite shallow, about 1mm high only so all good doming resins will be fine to use here.  For polymer clay that is baked in place, you can remove the clay shape once baked and glue it back into place for a perfect and secure fit.

Or, you can quite easily simply stick a glass cabochon over a sealed print of your favourite image with a drop of glaze, and when dry, glue this into the tray.  

The bracelet measures 19cm (7.5 inches).  If you needed to adjust the size, you have a generous length of chain which you could make shorter, or replace with another silver plated chain if you wish it to be longer.  

The ring and T-bar hook closure is reasonably big (the ring replicates the size of the oval links), so you won't be struggling to do up your bracelet!   

**please note this bracelet is now offered with a plain edge to the bezels, and not a serrated edge**

name: Wooden Circle Tiles 1 inch (25.4mm)
description:
The possibilities are now officially endless...  These little round tiles are the latest addition to our jewellery making family and they open up a whole host of new crafting and jewellery making possibilities.  

They can be painted, decoupaged, embellished and glazed, pyrographed, drilled, quilted, hewn, whittled and sculpted, and the list goes on and on.  They also provide a good base onto which you can mount your creations that use other media - say embroidery for example.

They measure 1 inch/25.4mm in diameter and they fit into our round pendant trays though some pieces may need a little encouragement or a gentle bit of filing to ensure a good fit.  

They are made of solid birch wood from renewable and managed sources.  They have been sanded to make them smooth and comfortable to wear.  We want no splinters here!

*** Please note that these circle tiles have a straight edge, not slightly bevelled as in the pictures ***  

Try making your own magnets to give as presents!  Or, you could decorate one side finishing it with a layer of Diamond Glaze for a glossy resin-like look and then simply glue a bail on the back or try our epoxy stickers.  

Sold in packs of 10 or 100 tiles.

Or to see a tutorial for the blackboard pendant on the last picture, check out our blog www.jasminstudiocrafts.blogspot.com

description:
Beautiful round clear glass tiles, measuring 20mm (4/5 inch) across.  They have a good tall domed shape that measures 8mm high.

This listing is for a pack of 10 tiles, or choose a bigger pack and save! 

These are top quality completely clear glass cabochons, very smooth, shiny and totally see-through.  They a have a magnifying effect on the patterns they sit on so they will make your images jump!  

They have safe rounded corners, making them ideal for pendants, brooches or keyrings.  Just add a blank pendant tray or glue on a bail or why not try and make a set of magnets?

Please see other listings in my shop for all the items you will need to make beautiful jewellery and accessories. 

We offer a low £2.50 flat shipping rate within the UK - buy more and don't pay any more in postage!

name: Wooden Square Tiles 1 inch (25.4mm)
description:
Fantastically craftaliciously useful little square tiles which together with their round sisters, are the latest addition to our jewellery making family and they open up a whole host of new crafting and jewellery making possibilities.

They can be painted, decoupaged, embellished and glazed, pyrographed, drilled, quilted, hewn, whittled and sculpted, and the list goes on and on. They also provide a good base onto which you can mount your creations that use other mediums - say embroidery for example.

They measure 25.4mm in width and about 4mm tall.  They fit into our square pendant trays, but some may need to be filed down slightly to fit perfectly.  

Or you could decorate one side and simply glue a bail on the other, much like you would do with a scrabble tile pendant (please note that measuring around an inch, these trays are bigger than scrabble tiles).

They are made of solid birch wood from renewable and managed sources. They have been gently sanded to make them smooth and easy to wear.

name: Crystal Clear Little Glass Hearts 16mm
description:
These little poppets are the baby sisters to the original glass tile - with this listing you will receive 10 glass hearts, domed and perfect, measuring a little 16mm across, ideal for Valentine's day but perfect any day for showing off pictures of your loves - be they whomever or whatever they be!

Their little size makes them ideal for earrings, cufflinks and little pendants.

This listing is for a pack of 10 little glass hearts.

Shown in the photo next to the 23.5mm big sister.

Buy a few items and pay no more in postage!

name: Chrysanthemum Flower Resin Cabochons 15mm - Choose a Colour!
description:
We started stocking the popular chrysanthemums a few months ago, in five colours but now we have 29!!  These exquisite chrysanthemums measure 15mm and they come in a rainbow of colours.  

They are flatbacked meaning that you can glue them to most things (we can recommend E6000 for this, great glue!).  Their uses don't just stop at jewellery - we have used them for scrapbooking, to decorate handmade birthday cards and presents and we have even had them form part of the decor in a stylish wedding!

See last picture for a clear numbered list of available colours - if you double click on this last picture, it will be much kinder to your eyes!

These little chrysanthemums come in packs of 10 flowers in one colour.  Please note this listing is for 10 flowers of THE SAME COLOUR.

name: Medium Glue-On Bails - many colours
description:
A great set of bails, a little bit bigger than the very popular little leaf bails, and now in a variety of colours. 

These bails are fantastic for your bigger glass pieces.  For reference, the photo shows one of the bails being used with a 25mm glass cabochon.

They measure:
 - gold plated bails:  24x8mm, with 4.5x7mm opening
 - antique bronze bails: 26x8mm, with 4.5x8mm opening
 - vintage copper bails: 22.5x8.5mm, with 4.5x7.5mm opening

These bails are also very similar to Aanraku bails, they are lovely and smooth and have a generous flat area for gluing.   They are ideal for making glass tile pendants or for use with gemstone cabochons or  dichroic glass shapes.

This listing is for one pack of 10 bails. 

To use, just coat the textured pad with E6000 glue, (available from my shop) allow to dry as flat and tight to the piece as possible and leave for a few hours, or even better, overnight.

Please see other listings in the shop for all the items you will need to make beautiful jewellery and accessories. We stock Aanraku bails, Pendant Blanks, Chiyogami papers, E6000 glue, Judikins Diamond Glaze and much much more!

We offer a low £2.50 flat shipping rate within the UK - buy more and don't pay any more in postage!

name: Wire Bow Pendants
description:
Ever so cute, these little wire bows need nothing more than to be strung onto a dainty chain, and they'll show off their simplicity to best advantage.  Just a little bow, celebratory, feminine, reminiscent of birthdays and Christmasses and little girls' hairdo's. What's not to like?

These cutie bows measure 22x17mm.  Available in silver plated or antique bronze.

Sold in packs of 10 pieces.

name: Bag holders with resin stickers
description:
Birthdays are now sorted!  This is one for the girls - mostly!  How many times have you been out for a drink or a meal and ended up leaving your handbag on the floor only to find it got wet and grubby, or you resign yourself to hang it on the back of your chair, knowing full well that it might as well have an arrow with "thieves, this way" in flashing lights over it?  Or maybe you have sat down to an uncomfortable dinner where your bag has not left your lap?  I think we have probably all done all three at some point!   

This nifty little gadget allows you to hang your handbag from the table, so it hangs just next to you, without touching the floor.  All you do is unravel the hook mechanism, twist the pad so that the hook has a stable surface to sit onto the table, and hey presto, bag's clean and safe!  

The bonus now is that these little gadgets can accept your own artwork!  So whether you want to give it to your nan with a picture of you, or to your bff with a picture of Justin Bieber, you can be sure that they'll appreciate this little gift!

These bag hooks measure about 45mm across, and they take a 30mm cabochon, or use the resin sticker provided.  They are sold individually on in packs of 5.

Bags of the world - rejoice!

name: Round Pendant Trays 15mm - Various Colours!
description:
Lovely pendant trays for making your own photo/picture pendants.

They give a fantastic finish to your handmade jewellery.

The opening of these trays measures approximately 15mm (0.59 inches) across.  The bail opening is 6x4mm (please check it will fit the necklaces you plan on using). The tray is approximately 3mm in depth.

This listing is for 10 x pendant trays. (Glass cabochons are sold in separate listings).

The trays are made of coated brass and are lead and nickel free. They are available in Silver Plated, Gold Plated, Antique Silver, Glossy Black, Antique Bronze and Vintage Copper.

Please note depending on the batch, the pendant trays may come out slightly bigger - closer to a 16mm size.  If you have a preference, or simply want to make sure, just ping us an email.

name: Crystal Clear Domed Oval Glass Cabochons 18x25mm
description:
These are very lovely!  They are made of completely clear glass, softly rounded like all my other glass pieces, so it is safe for jewellery.

These ovals measure 18x25mm and they are sold in packs of 10 or in bigger packs of 100 pieces.

We have also just received some pendants that fit these glass pieces - try them out for a perfectly finished jewellery piece!  

(Please note this listing is for the glass only - the pendant shown in the picture is not included but can be bought separately)

name: Amazing Glaze - Clear Mixable Embossing Powder 30ml
description:
Amazing Glaze is a clear, dimensional embossing powder that creates a glossy surface over paper and wood. Perfect for faux sealing wax effects. Can be mixed with other embossing powders for added colour and special effects.

Well known in the card-making and scrapbooking worlds for the papercrafting capabilities it offers, but you can also use Amazing Glaze to seal or embed embellishments or trinkets into pendant trays.  

To use, set your work on a piece of foil and dip your pendant tray into the pot of Amazing Glaze then just use your craft heat gun or a toaster oven set at 120oC / 250oF for the powder to melt to a gorgeous glass-like sheen.  

Easy!
	  	
This listing is for a 30ml pot

name: Brooch Backs - Black 20mm
description:
Sweet little brooch backs, perfect for using with any glass tiles and ideally paired with the flat metal backs to fit the round 25mm glass and stickers for a professional finish to your handmade projects.

These little brooch backs measure 20mm long and 5mm wide, so they fit perfectly into the popular 25mm glass pieces.  

Please see separate listings for glass and metal covers to match these brooch findings.

This listing is for 10 brooch backs.

name: Tie Pins - Silver or Gold Plated
description:
Cute little tie pins for you to add your own topping!  This can be one of my glass tiles with an image of your choice or any other small flat back stone or cabochon of your choice.  The pad on the pin measures about 3.5mm, and the back piece is spring loaded.

This listing is for 10 x tie pins.  Please note no glass is included in this listing but is available separately from the shop. 

Please see other listings in the shop for all the items you will need to make beautiful jewellery and accessories.  We have lots of bails, pendant blanks, Chiyogami papers, E6000 glue, Judikins Diamond Glaze and much much more!

Happy making!

name: Resin Flower Clusters 16mm - Candyfloss Pink
description:
Pink and girly - these little flower clusters are fab.  These flowers are made of resin and they come in a delicious soft candyfloss pink.  They are nicely finished with flat backs so they will look great on your jewellery pieces.  They can be used as cabochons on rings or glued to hair pins for a cute accessory that does 'romantic' just as well as it does 'flirty'!

They measure 16mm across and are 8mm high.  To glue them to any metal surface we can recommend e6000 glue available separately in the shop.

These flowers come in packs of 10, all in the same colour.

Note please that the last picture is a size comparison with other resin flowers available in the shop, and those flowers are available separately but do not form part of this listing.

name: Crystal Clear Domed Square Glass Tiles 25mm
description:
Now back in stock!!  Beautiful crystal clear domed square glass tiles.  These beautiful glass pieces have a magnifying effect on the images they sit over so your graphics will come alive.

This listing is for a pack of of 10 (ten) domed glass tiles measuring 25x25mm.

To use for jewellery, just coat your images with Mod Podge to seal (available from my shop), and once dry glue to the glass with Diamond Glaze.  Another layer of Diamond Glaze over the back will help protect your image.  Allow the piece to dry flat for a few hours, or even better, overnight, then glue the glass to your jewellery blank and you're all set! The glass will really make your images pop!

Also available in other shapes and sizes.

Please see other listings in my shop for all the items you will need to make beautiful jewellery and accessories.  I have lots of bails, pendant blanks, Chiyogami papers, E6000 glue, Judikins Diamond Glaze and much much more!

Happy making!

name: Fluxe Enamelling Resin 2oz 57g
description:
New this week!  Easy to use Fluxe enamelling resin from Judikins.

This resin comes as a powder that you pour straight onto your creations from the pink bottle.  On application of heat (250oF/121oC), the powder melts to a clear resin which then hardens.

You can use a craft heat gun, small portable oven as long as the temperature is right, and you observe some basic safety rules (the resin gets hot AND liquid - so beware!).  

Within a while of heating, you will see the powder melt before your eyes into a clear liquid which then sets hard and clear.

Conventional resins with the exacting measurements and elaborate safety requirements can seem a bit overwhelming to the average hobby user, but Fluxe takes all the fear out of using resins, making them accessible to everyone who is happy (and old enough!) to use a heat gun.  

Available in 2oz/57g bottles.  As it is a powder, some settling may occur - please note that this item is sold by weight and not volume.

Whilst stocks last, Judikins will donate 10% of proceeds to US Cancer Research Charities.

name: Big Hearts for Resin/Altered Art with Optional Stickers
description:
Big, beautiful and here at last!!  We have coveted these beauties for a long old time here at Jasmin Studio, and finally they are available to buy!

The options here are innumerable - try them with the optional epoxy stickers we sell that were designed especially to fit this size of tray. These hearts will work particularly well with resins - we can recommend the easy to use Amazing Glaze and Fluxe from the shop which are one-part resins and only require heat to melt and fix.  Or they will happily house your polymer clay designs, felt work, little dioramas - you really are only limited by your imagination.  

These hearts are BIG!  they measure approximately 60x50mm at their widest points (that is about 2.4x2 inches) and have a deep 4mm bezel to hold your creations.  They are made of zinc alloy and available in a lovely antique silver plated finish with a gorgeous texture front and back.

For their size, they will be equally at home in a BIG piece of statement jewellery, as in various home decoration projects - maybe something for a little girl's room or as Christmas decorations.   I expect these will be very popular!

Sold in packs of 2 hearts or 10 hearts.

name: Ornate Oval Pendant Blanks for 13x18mm glass - choice of colours!
description:
We have just received a shipment of these beautiful antique-styled oval pendants - our first ovals in the shop!   

The opening takes a 13x18mm oval glass cabochon, sold separately in the shop.

These little pendants have a beautiful weight, and feel nice and solid.  They are plated in vintage finishes of antique silver, antique bronze,  vintage copper and now a beautiful and bright silver plate!

A bail will be included so that all you will have to do is complete them with your favourite image and then simply hang from a chain, or try hanging them directly from earwires of the same colour.

Sold in packs of 10.

name: European Spring-Back Earrings with 12mm Bezel Cup
description:
Ahh these are so very smart!  Beautiful quality earring findings for pierced ears, with a sprung back (called a European fitting!) and a generous 12mm bezel for adding your choice of gemstone or glass cabochon, epoxy sticker, resin or polymer clay. 

Available in value packs of 10 pairs, or individually if you just want to make sure they are right for you, these come in a rainbow of colours:
- silver plated
- gold plated 
- antique silver
- steely silver tone
- antique bronze
- vintage copper
- gunmetal black.  

The generous bezel cup fits our 12mm glass or sticker perfectly.  These are available on separate listings. Both are equally beautiful.  We can't decide between them.  Will have to have both.

These earrings are ideal for using with resin, polymer clay, gemstones and glass cabochons. For use with glass cabochons you will require a completely clear glaze to ensure the image shows through clearly under the glass - Diamond Glaze, available on a separate listing, is ideal for this. Remember to coat any image well with sealant or decoupage glue before applying the glaze so that the colours do not run. Always test your paper before making up the final piece.

name: Ring Blanks with 16mm bezel cup - different colours!
description:
New size!  A little sister to the very popular 25mm rings, these 16mm lovelies will sit gracefully on your finger with your choice of adornment!  The simple and elegant design, and the colours available, mean that they can carry off a variety of styles, from modern to vintage, from family photos to a favourite painting.  

Available singly or in value packs of 10 for bigger jewellery-making projects, these rings come in a gorgeous array of platings:  silver plated, gold plated, antique bronze, vintage copper and a glossy gunmetal Black.

Get the girls together, get a pack of rings, some glass cabochons, a bottle of Diamond Glaze and one of wine, and spend an evening making some beautiful jewellery easily and economically.  Guaranteed to be loved by giftees of all ages!  

One adjustable size will fit all except for the smallest of fingers.

**IMPORTANT NOTE** 
Please be aware glass cabochons are no longer included in this listing, but are available separately. Please look for "16mm Round Glass Cabochons for Cufflinks and Rings" to ensure a good fit, as our standard 16mm Glass Cabochons may be just slightly too big for these rings.

These rings are ideal for using with resin, polymer clay, gemstones and glass cabochons. For use with glass cabochons you will require a completely clear glaze to ensure the image shows through clearly under the glass - Diamond Glaze, available on a separate listing, is ideal for this. Remember to coat any image well with sealant or decoupage glue before applying the glaze so that the colours do not run. Always test your paper before making up the final piece.

name: Rectangular Pendant Trays 24x48mm - choice of colours!
description:
Brand new in the shop - a very exciting arrival of rectangular pendant trays.  These are beautiful quality pendant trays, a zinc & lead free alloy available in a lovely bright silver plated, a gorgeous muted antique bronze finish or a russet-y vintage copper.

These fit the 24x48mm rectangular glass tiles for sale in the shop.  

This listing is for one pack of 10 pendants trays.   The glass is not included in this listing, but can be bought separately in the shop.

To use these trays for glass pendants, glue your image to the glass with Diamond Glaze, (available from the shop) allow to dry flat and when ready, glue the glass to the tray.  Or you can use these with resins, polymer clays.... the list is endless!

Please see other listings in the shop for all the items you will need to make beautiful jewellery and accessories. We stock bails, Pendant Blanks, Chiyogami papers, E6000 glue, Judikins Diamond Glaze and much much more!

We offer a low £2.50 flat shipping rate within the UK - buy more and don't pay any more in postage!

name: Glass Potion Bottles 45x22mm - Packs of 4 or 8
description:
Clear glass vials measuring 45x22mm with a little cork stopper.  

Available in packs of 4 or 8.

The cork is not fixed, so you can fill them as you wish.  

They can be used for decoration, craft or even jewellery!  If you wish to use them for jewellery I recommend you obtain some little eye screws to fix to the cork from any DIY shop, and then once filled, superglue the cork into the glass for strength.

Question is...  what will you put in yours?

name: Baby Ball Chain 1.5mm 24in/60cm - many colours!
description:
The baby sister to the popular ball chain. Your little creations will love these chains!

These chains are made of plated iron, and they are really easy to use - they come ready with little tube clasps so you just fit one end of the chain into the little tube, and pull! the chain will snap closed really easily.

They measure 1.5mm in thickness, so these are ideal for our tiny flower bails.  They are strong, however if you would like to hang a heavy pendant, or you prefer something a bit heftier, then please look at the 2.4mm chains listed in the shop.  See the photographs in this listing for a quick comparison between the two sizes.

The chains are 60cm/24in long, but can be cut to size easily with strong scissors or wire cutters.

Available individually or in packs of 10 that offer great savings, in a choice of silver plated, antique bronze and now gold plated, antique copper and gunmetal black.

name: Make a Keyring Kit - choice of colours!
description:
The choices for gift giving just get bigger and bigger!  Excellent little kit for making your own keyrings, all you need to add is a picture of your choice and some glue, everything else is provided.  

These kits make ideal presents for both men and women - but knowing how hard it is to buy presents for the boys, this little set is a life saver!   Have you ever wondered what to get for the man in your life that would raise a smile but that didn't involve another pair of humorous socks?  The possibilities with these little keyrings really are endless!  From a photo of the kids to one his team's most memorable goal to his beloved vintage cars.   Or how about getting the little ones to do a tiny drawing? 

All you need to do is find a suitable picture, stick the resin sticker provided onto the picture, cut around it, glue it into the tray, press it in really well and leave to dry.  When the glue is set you can attach the rings, and there you go, present sorted!  This is so easy, you can get the kids to make their own family Christmas presents easily and safely.

This little set includes:
- one pendant blank to hold 25mm picture (available in antique silver or antique bronze finish)
- one large split ring 
- one small split ring (to connect the two pieces)
- one epoxy resin sticker (available in crystal clear or glitter finish)

Enough to make one keyring, just add your own glue and picture.  Larger quantities available.

These keyrings are available in a choice of finishes, antique silver, antique bronze or vintage copper.   The resin sticker is crystal clear and is available in a plain or glittery finish - the sticker provides a beautiful and durable clear glossy finish that is scratch and knock-resistant, and unlike the glass items in my shop, these stickers are perfect for making keyrings which can be dropped and knocked.  The stickers and fittings are waterproof, but water resistance will ultimately depend on the glue and image used, so it is advisable to tell the recipient of your gift not to use the final product in wet conditions.

name: High-Domed Crystal Clear Round Glass Cabochons 14mm
description:
Beautiful crystal clear high domed glass cabochons.  These beautiful glass pieces have a magnifying effect on the images they sit over so your graphics will come alive.

This listing is for a pack of of 10 (ten) glass cabochons measuring 14mm across and just over 5mm high.

To use for jewellery, just coat your images with Mod Podge to seal and once dry glue to the glass with Diamond Glaze.  Another layer of Diamond Glaze over the back will help protect your image.  Allow the piece to dry flat for a few hours, or even better, overnight, then glue the glass to your jewellery blank and you're all set! The glass will really make your images pop!

Also available in other shapes and sizes.

Please see other listings in my shop for all the items you will need to make beautiful jewellery and accessories.  I have lots of bails, pendant blanks, Chiyogami papers, E6000 glue, Judikins Diamond Glaze and much much more!

Happy making!

name: Ball Chain Necklaces 2.4mm 24in/60cm, Packs of 10 - Many Colours Available!
description:
Probably the most useful accessory to your handmade pendants - a fun but smart ball chain.  Your glass tile pendants will feel right at home dangling from these necklaces!

These chains are made of plated iron, and they are really easy to use - they come ready made as necklaces with little tube clasps so you just fit one end of the chain into the little tube, and pull!  the chain will snap closed really easily and your necklace is ready.  

They measure 2.4mm thick, so will be fine in all but our smallest flower bails (for those, please consider our tiny 1.5mm ball chains listed separately).  The chains are 60cm/24in long, but can be cut to size easily with strong scissors or wire cutters.

We have recently changed the bright coloured chains from spray painted to electroplated - we feel they are much better quality and they do not get anywhere near as scratched as the sprayed ones - we think you will love the new quality!    

Available in packs of 10 that offer great savings, in a rainbow of colours:
- Silver Plated
- Gold Plated
- Glossy Black Gunmetal 
- Solid Black (NEW!)
- Antique Silver (NEW!)
- Antique Bronze
- Vintage Copper
- Blue
- Pink
- Lilac
- Orange
- Surprise Mix (this will be a mix of any of at least 4 colours - a surprise choice, a choice surprise!)

Please note that some of the photos show the old sprayed chains - these are no longer available.

name: Snap Bails - Choice of Colours
description:
This listing is for a choice of sturdy snap bails.  They are used where you prefer to hang your pendant from something a little more substantial than a jump ring.  

They work by 'snapping' your pendant into position through the open back of the bail, and then if necessary, gently pushing the bail ends back together.  You can also fix your pendant into position by actually threading the bail through a link on the chain.

They measure about 7x4mm so will fit most chains.  Please note a pack of bails is already included with some of pendants where the loop hangs parallel to the pendant.

Available in packs of 10 or 100, in the following choice of colours:
- Light Silver
- Antique Silver
- Antique Bronze
- Vintage Copper

name: Toggle Clasps - Choice of Colours!
description:
Useful toggle clasps, available in a choice of colours, ideal for making your own necklaces and bracelets.

These clasps come in packs of 10 and are available in antique silver, antique bronze and vintage copper.

The ring part measures approximately 14mm in diameter, and 21mm at its widest part (this is including the attachment ring).  The toggle measures approximately 18mm long.  The hole is approximately 1.5mm across.

name: Lobster Clasps - Various Colours!
description:
Pack of 10 lobster clasps, ideal for making your own necklaces.

These clasps measure 12x6mm and come in silver plated, antique silver, antique bronze, vintage copper, gold plated, gunmetal black and solid black.  

Use them to make your own chains, or for hanging charms from bracelets.  

Please note the solid black clasps are slightly different in style - they are a little bit more angular than the clasps pictured.

name: Jump Rings - Different Colours Available!
description:
Useful little jump rings, available in silver plated, antique silver, gold plated, antique copper or antique bronze, ideal for making your own necklaces and bracelets, or simply for attaching a charm or pendant onto a chain.

They measure 6-7mm and are available in packets of approximately 100.

We offer a low flat postage rate of £2.50 for all UK purchases!

name: Ornate Chain by the Meter - Different Colours Available!
description:
We are loving this chain!  Beautiful mother & son style, with oval links and figure of 8 links, available in three beautiful colours - silver plated, antique bronze or vintage copper, this chain is perfect for all your jewellery projects.

The oval links measure 8x6x1mm and the figure of 8 links measure 8x4x1mm, making it perfect for both necklaces and light bracelets.  

The links will happily go through the bails on my pendant trays.  Please note the figure of 8 links are not crossed over.  

This chain is sold by the meter (about 40 inches or 3.3 feet).  

You will find all you need to make your own necklaces and bracelets in other listings in the shop.

name: Oval Connector Blanks for 13x18mm Glass - choice of colours!
description:
Part of our range of oval fittings, these connector blanks come in either antique silver or vintage bronze finish.  They fit the 13x18mm oval glass cabochons for sale separately in the shop or you can use them with resin.

These pieces have a ring at either end so you can connect them together to form a bracelet, or use just one or two connectors in a run of chain to make a unique personalised necklace.

This listing is for 10 connector blanks, in a choice of antique silver or vintage bronze.  Glass pieces are not included in this sale but are available separately.

name: Crystal Clear Domed Oval Glass Cabochons 13x18mm
description:
These are very nice, and they have the honour of being the first ovals to be stocked in the shop!  They are made of completely clear glass, softly rounded like all our other glass pieces, so it is safe for jewellery.

These ovals measure 13x18mm and they are sold in packs of 10 or 100.

We have also just received some pendants and connector trays that fit these glass pieces - try them out for a perfectly finished jewellery piece!

name: Crystal Clear Domed Round Glass Cabochons 16mm
description:
Beautiful crystal clear domed glass cabochons.  These beautiful glass pieces have a magnifying effect on the images they sit over so your graphics will come alive.

This glass is available in packs of of 10 or 100 glass cabochons, measuring 16mm across.  We also offer a calibrated size for use in our cufflinks and ring settings - please see separate listing.

To use for jewellery, just coat your images with Mod Podge to seal (available from my shop), and once dry glue to the glass with Diamond Glaze.  Another layer of Diamond Glaze over the back will help protect your image.  Allow the piece to dry flat for a few hours, or even better, overnight, then glue the glass to your jewellery blank and you're all set! The glass will really make your images pop!

Also available in other shapes and sizes.

Please see other listings in the shop for all the items you will need to make beautiful jewellery and accessories.  We have lots of bails, pendant blanks, Chiyogami papers, E6000 glue, Judikins Diamond Glaze and much much more!

Happy making!

name: Connector Trays for 16mm Glass Cabochons - Different Colours!
description:
Fancy making your own glass tile bracelets?  These trays will be fabulous - all you need are jumprings and a clasp!  Or how about using them with chain for a gorgeous necklace?

These connectors are a lovely quality, very solid and they have a nice weight.  Fill them with your preferred images and either resin or a glass cabochon to make your images pop!

Their external measurements are 26x19x3.5mm and the tray is 16mm in diameter, which means they fit the 16mm round glass cabochons perfectly - they are available separately in the shop.  The opening for the jumpring is approximately 2mm.

Please note glass cabochons are not included in this listing!  They are, however, available separately.

Available in antique silver, antique bronze and aged copper.  Sold in packs of 10.

name: Little Cherub Charms - Different Colours!
description:
Beautifully detailed, these cherub charms will add a touch of whimsy to your jewellery.   They look gorgeous alongside a vintage style glass tile pendant, or simply dangling off a bracelet.

The angels look very much like Raphael's version from the Sistine Chapel!  Very cute.

Each little cherub measures 20x15x3mm and the ring opening is 2mm wide.  These alloy charms are beautifully plated, the gold looks like gold and the silver looks like silver!

Available in bright Silver Plated, Gold Plated, Antique Bronze and Vintage Copper.  Sold in packs of 10 pieces.

name: Opening Purse Lockets
description:
These are gorgeous!  Beautiful rectangular antique bronze lockets, in the shape of a purse and oooh they open!  so you can fill them with a special secret message for your intended recipient!  

They have two rings for attaching to a necklace or bracelet, and they have a ridged surface texture.  They open and close with a satisfying 'click', and will hold a small piece of folded paper or a tiny photo.

They measure 22x17x5mm, and the opening is approximately 20x3mm.  

We will be filling these with photos and little calligraphied notes.  Just adorable.

Sold in packs of 2 purses.

name: Dangly Earrings 10mm Bezel - Silver or Gold Plated
description:
Lovely earring set for you to make your own glass tile jewellery!

Includes gold or silver plated earwire, plastic earnut fastening and 10mm pendant cup. 

We now have smooth edge pendant cups as well as serrated - if you have a preference please let us know.  

In comparison to those of you who know & love the 8mm danglies, these are slightly bigger (obviously!), but the pendant is a slightly different style - the cup is slightly shallower and it has a lovely serrated edge detail.  Beyond that, the possibilities for making gorgeous earrings remain the same for all sizes!

This listing is for one pack of 10 pairs of earrings.   Just choose your favourite colour, and your favourite insert - you can use these with our glass cabochons, resin, polymer clay, felt - a huge amount of possibilities!

**Please note glass is not included in this listing, but is available here:  
http://www.jasminstudiocrafts.bigcartel.com/product/10-x-crystal-creal-domed-round-glass-cabochons-10mm  - and please remember that for 10 pairs of earrings you will need 2 packs of glass **

To use with glass, just coat your images with Mod Podge to seal (available from the shop), and once dry glue to the glass with Diamond Glaze.  Another tiny drop of Diamond Glaze will glue the glass to your tray.  Allow the piece to dry flat for a few hours, or even better, overnight, then attach the pendant cup to the earwire and you're all set! The glass will make your images pop! Even though they are little, these earrings will be noticed.

You can make beautiful jewellery for presents, and the re-sell value of the finished earrings is huge!  And yet, they will cost you only pennies per pair plus the cost of some glue and a bit of paper to make.  :)

Please see other listings in the shop for all the items you will need to make beautiful jewellery and accessories.  We have lots of bails, pendant blanks, Chiyogami papers, E6000 glue, Judikins Diamond Glaze and much much more!

Happy making!

name: Ornate Round Pendant Setting Blanks 25mm - Choice of Colours!
description:
Beautiful antique finish vintage style pendant trays for making your own pendants.  They are available in a choice of beautiful colours: antique silver, antique bronze and now also in vintage copper.  

The opening of these trays measures 25mm (1 inch) across and is just right for the 25mm round cabochon glass pieces and epoxy stickers that we sell in the shop (not included in this listing).  Ideal to fill with your own images.

* please note that Diamond Glaze reacts with items with antique finishes and will give your images a bluish tint - to avoid this, please seal the images well with 2 to 3 coats of decoupage glue, Mod Podge or diluted PVA glue. Also seal the space where the paper will sit into the pendant tray with the same glue.  Once dry, you can attach the paper to the glue.

The base for the glass insert is 25mm wide and approximately 1mm in depth.

This listing is for 10 x pendant trays and they will come with 10 x snap bails so you can hang them easily from a chain. 

Please note the glass cabochons in the photos are for illustration only and NOT included in this sale.  If you would like to purchase some glass pieces, they are available in the shop.

name: Cufflinks with 16mm Cup, Choice of Colours!
description:
Lovely plated cufflink blanks, these are nice and strong and together with your own photo or print, they will make the boys look super smart!  

They are made of brass and are nickel and lead free, and are available in silver plated, gold plated, antique bronze, antique silver, vintage copper or glossy gunmetal black.  Please state your choice using the drop down list below (and please note if any options are out of stock they will not appear on the list).

**IMPORTANT NOTE**  
Please be aware glass cabochons are not included in this listing, but are available separately.  We also sometimes receive batches of both glass and cufflinks which are slightly smaller or slightly bigger than standard - if you need to buy glass for this item, we recommend buying the "best fit glass" offered within the drop down options in this listing and we will make sure you receive the best glass to fit your cufflinks (this will normally be either 15 or 16mm, standard dome).  

Please note also that cufflinks may have either a straight or slightly bevelled edge - normally each order will contain either one or the other type but not both.  If you have a preference please let us know and we will try our best to give you your preferred type, however we cannot guarantee that both types will always be in stock.  We have recently found the straight edged cufflinks are a fraction smaller than the bevelled edge, so for these, the 15mm glass cabs might fit better. If in doubt, speak to us and we'll try to help.

These cufflinks are ideal for using with resin, polymer clay, gemstones and glass cabochons.  For use with glass cabochons you will require a completely clear glaze to ensure the image shows through clearly under the glass - Diamond Glaze, available on a separate listing, is ideal for this.  Remember to coat any image well with sealant or decoupage glue before applying the glaze so that the colours do not run.  Always test your paper before making up the final piece.  

Please see other listings in our shop for all the items you will need to make these cufflinks and other beautiful jewellery and accessories.  

We offer a low £2.50 flat shipping rate within the UK - buy more and don't spend any more on postage!

name: Steel Dog Tags & Matching Epoxy Resin Stickers - Different Sizes Available!
description:
Gorgeous!  a set of stainless steel dog tags and matching clear epoxy resin sticker for you to make your own personalised pendants or key rings.  

These are super-easy to use.  Just choose a photo you want to use, stick the self-adhesive epoxy sticker over the top, cut around the edges and glue this to your metal tag.   You will have your own customised glossy dog tag in minutes and your images will sing!

There are two sizes available: large tags measure 50x30mm and small ones measure 38x22mm.

Available in packs of 5 or 10 dog tags.  If you need additional stickers, you will find them within the drop-down list below.

They are made of outstanding quality smooth highly polished stainless steel.  The glossy sticker domes are made of clear epoxy resin, completely clear and colourless, and are free of dust and fibre.  

Try them, and I guarantee you will be impressed!

name: Mod Podge Sealer Decoupage Glue Matte, Gloss, Sparkle or Silver Shimmer 8fl oz/236ml
description:
Classic Mod Podge 8fl oz/236 ml in a choice of Matte, Gloss, Sparkle or Silver Shimmer.  

The original Mod Podge formula that’s a glue, sealer and finish all in one!  Use this crafting favorite to decoupage almost anything on wood, glass, terra cotta, metal, canvas and more, then seal with a top coat of Mod Podge. Projects dry to a protective finish.

For or over 40 years, crafters have used Mod Podge® for their most treasured creations. This amazing all-in-one glue, sealer and finish has come along way since its invention in the 1960s and has become a true favorite among crafters of every style and skill level for its versatility, dependability and value. It’s a glue to adhere paper, fabric and other porous materials to almost any surface, it holds tight and dries clear. It’s a sealer that protects decoupage, acrylic paint, stain, fabric and more! It’s a finish that is durable, smooth and fast-drying! Non-toxic with a simple soap and water clean up makes it great for kid's crafts, too.

This listing is for a large 8 fl oz bottle (236ml) of your choice of: 

Matte Mod Podge (the yellow bottle), 
Gloss Mod Podge (the red one), 
Sparkle Mod Podge (the pink one) and 
Silver Shimmer Mod Podge (the silver one).  

We also have a few little trial size bottles of Sparkle Mod Podge (2fl oz, 60ml) - and more varieties will be coming soon!

Use it to coat your graphics, images, photographs and Chiyogami to seal before applying Diamond Glaze, or use it as a top coat to decoupaged wooden tiles.  Apply 2 or 3 coats and allow it to dry well between coats.  Remember to always test your graphics first!

Please see other listings in our shop for all the items you will need to make beautiful jewellery and accessories.

name: Black Faux Leather Necklaces
description:
These plaited faux leather necklaces have a lovely smooth feel to them, you might never guess they were not leather - they are flexible and will look great with your hand made pendants.

With this new batch I have received, I asked my supplier to leave one end open so that the cord can be threaded through most of my bails and pendant settings - it makes all the difference!  Once you have added your pendant, all you need to do is tighten the spring end onto the plait with a pair of jewellery pliers.

Each necklace measures 18"/45cm long, and the width of the plait is about 3mm.  Once closed, the end will measure approximately 8mm in diameter.

Sold in packs of 10 necklaces.

name: Micro Glaze Protector Wax for Paper, Wood, Metal etc.
description:
Micro Glaze is a specialty product for calligraphers and artists and craftsmen. 

The thin and easy-to-apply coating of wax protects projects from water, air and oxidation. Micro Glaze can be used on paper, wood, metal and many other materials.

It was originally developed by a small art studio in the USA to protect hand decorated papers.

Environmentally friendly, Micro Glaze is the perfect choice for protecting most surfaces including paper. Just rub a tiny dab on the surface, and spread very thinly over the area to be protected.  The area is now water resistant. No raindrop stains or smears from routine handling. Micro Glaze is unobtrusive and hard to detect.  

Whilst Micro Glaze is safe to use on most surfaces, always test a small area of your project first.

Micro Glaze is non-toxic and acid-free, but ordinary art materials precautions apply (do not ingest, or apply to skin or eyes!). Not recommended for children.

Uses:

FOR ARTISTS:
    fountain pen written text
    calligraphed or rubber stamped envelopes, cards and mail art
    to protect inkjet printed cards, signs and mail art
    brushed as a resist for watercolor or stamped texture
    for “batik” effects on paper
    to preserve the surface of marbled or decorative paper
    to prevent painted altered book pages from sticking

THE OFFICE:
    protect Ink Jet or Bubble Jet printer output
    on signs and labels
    to silence or stop squeeky file drawers

AT HOME:
    on book covers such as fancy journals or albums
    on recipe cards and labels to protect pages or bookcovers
    on metal tools, equipment, or on antiques to prevent rust

CRAFTSMEN:
    on collectible metal airplanes
    on cogs & gears and saw blades
    on garden tools to prevent rust

Beautiful crystal clear domed square glass tiles.  These beautiful glass pieces have a magnifying effect on the images they sit over so your graphics will come alive.

This listing is for a pack of of 10 (ten) domed glass tiles measuring 15x15mm.

To use for jewellery, just coat your images with Mod Podge to seal (available from my shop), and once dry glue to the glass with Diamond Glaze.  Another layer of Diamond Glaze over the back will help protect your image.  Allow the piece to dry flat for a few hours, or even better, overnight, then glue the glass to your jewellery blank and you're all set! The glass will really make your images pop!

Also available in other shapes and sizes.

Please see other listings in my shop for all the items you will need to make beautiful jewellery and accessories.  I have lots of bails, pendant blanks, Chiyogami papers, E6000 glue, Judikins Diamond Glaze and much much more!

Happy making!

name: Crystal Clear Teensy Round Glass Cabochons 8mm
description:
These are the cutest thing, the babies of the range.  

A set of tiny crystal clear round flatback cabochon domes, measuring just 8mm across and about 3.5mm high at the centre.  And they *still* have a magnifying effect on the images they sit over.  

We sell lots of items that fit well with these tiny pieces - check our our  little stud or dangly earrings, meaning that your favourite mini-images can now fit perfectly into a small made-to-measure bezel.

Available in packs of 10 or 100 pieces.

name: Crystal Clear Domed Square Glass Tiles 12mm
description:
Beautiful crystal clear domed square glass tiles.  These gorgeous glass pieces have a magnifying effect on the images they sit over so your graphics will come alive.

This listing is for a pack of of 10 (ten) domed glass tiles measuring 12x12mm.

To use for jewellery, just coat your images with Mod Podge to seal (available from our shop), and once dry glue to the glass with Diamond Glaze.  Another layer of Diamond Glaze over the back will help protect your image.  Allow the piece to dry flat for a few hours, or even better, overnight, then glue the glass to your jewellery blank and you're all set! The glass will really make your images pop!

Also available in other shapes and sizes.

Please see other listings in my shop for all the items you will need to make beautiful jewellery and accessories.  I have lots of bails, pendant blanks, Chiyogami papers, E6000 glue, Judikins Diamond Glaze and much much more!

Happy making!

name: Silver Plated Cufflink Blanks with Pad
description:
These smart cufflinks are perfect for gluing any dichroic and resin cabochons, Scrabble tiles and glass tiles to make handsome gifts for the boys.

They are made of silver plated copper, and are lead and nickel free. 

They measure 25x8mm (the pad itself is 8mm across)

This listing is for 1 (one) pair of blank cufflinks, or buy more and save!

To use, just coat the pad with E6000 glue, (available from my shop), allowing the piece to dry as upright as possible and leave for a few hours, or even better, overnight.

name: Small Flower Glue-on Bails
description:
Little glue-on bails for use with dichroic cabochons, Scrabble tiles and glass tiles to make lovely pendants.  

They are made of zinc alloy and finished in either an antique silver or antique bronze tone.  The flower measures about 10.5mm in diameter, and the whole length of the bail is approximately 15mm. 

The opening of the bail is 2mm. 

Please note the size of the opening when buying these to ensure your chains will fit as the opening is very very small!

We stock baby ball chains that will fit through these bails.

This listing is for one pack of 10 bails.

To use, just coat the side with the curly design with E6000 glue, (available from my shop) allow to dry as flat as possible and leave for a few hours, or even better, overnight.

name: Crystal Clear Square Glass Tiles 25x25mm
description:
Beautiful square clear glass tiles, measuring 25mm (about 1 inch) per side and 4mm thick.

This listing is for a pack of 10 tiles or buy in larger quantities and save!

These are top quality completely clear glass tiles, very shiny and totally see-through - they will make your images jump!

They have safe rounded corners, making them ideal for pendants. Just add a blank pendant tray or glue on a bail or why not try and make a set of magnets?

Please see other listings in my shop for all the items you will need to make beautiful jewellery and accessories.

We offer a low £2.50 flat shipping rate within the UK - buy more and don't pay any more in postage!

name: Rose Flower Resin Cabochons 15x7mm - Pick Your Own!
description:
NEW!  Beautiful little resin rose cabochons measuring 15x7mm.

These fit perfectly on top of hair pins, ring pads, bails etc, and are also perfect embellishments for other projects in addition to jewellery, so the possibilities will be endless! 

This listing is for either 5 or 10 little flat-back roses - you can choose between purple, red, pink, white and black single-colour packs or a mixed colour pack where you will receive an even mix of little roses of each of the above colours.

The finished pins shown in the pictures (with resin roses and chrysanthemums) are for illustration only and not included in this sale, though there are separate listings for resin chrysanths and metal bobby pins.

name: Ring Blanks with Pad - Silver or Bronze Tone, also in Kids' Sizes!
description:
Adjustable silver or antique bronze toned rings with gluing pads for dichroic and resin cabochons, Scrabble tiles and glass tiles to make pretty finger jewellery.

They are made of copper, and plated in silver colour or antique bronze.  The pad measures about 10mm across and the ring itself measures about 17/18mm across (but as mentioned earlier they are adjustable and will give several additional millimetres).  The ring band itself measures 3 x 1.2mm..

**And now, we can also offer a smaller size ring, which is ideal for kids - they measure 15.5mm across the diameter and the pad is a teeny 6mm.  This version is available in silver tone only.**

This listing is for one pack of rings of 5 or 10 pieces. They will look perfect with the resin flower cabs you will find in the shop (but which not included in this sale).

To use, just coat the pad with E6000 glue, (available from my shop), allowing the piece to dry as upright as possible and leave for a few hours, or even better, overnight.

name: Mixed Wooden Letter Tiles - Random Packs - Just like Scrabble!
description:
Lovely wooden tiles, measuring 18 x 21 mm.

Available in packs of 10 or 100 random tiles, or you can also buy individual letters of your choice on a separate listing.

They are not Scrabble brand, but they are like Scrabble in size, feel & quality.   (Please note UK Scrabble tiles measure 18.5 per side, these are American size).

These are top quality letter tiles made of wood, flat at the back, very smooth and brand new, never played with!   They have no jagged edges making them ideal for pendants.  Just add a glue-on a bail and an image on the top and cover with Diamond Glaze for a beautiful, personalised piece of stylish jewellery, or have you tried our fantastic new epoxy stickers to fit?  They are fabulous! find them in the epoxy sticker section in the shop!

(Please note that this listing is for a random pack of tiles, and we cannot ensure that it will contain specific letters.  If you wish to choose your own letters, we can recommend our pick'n'mix of letter tiles, available on a separate listing.)

name: 8mm Earstud Bezel Blanks - Many Colours
description:
This listing is for a set of 10 pairs of earrings for you to make your own glass tile jewellery.

First we had the gorgeous Silver or Gold Plated earstuds with 8mm bezel cup and matching plated butterfly backs, and now Antique Bronze, Vintage Copper and Gunmetal Black have arrived!

Glass shown in the pictures is for illustration only and is not included in this sale.

This listing is for 10 pairs of earrings.  Excludes glass, but little cabochons or stickeres to fit are available elsewhere in the shop.  Please note you will need 2 packs of 10 pieces of glass or stickers for 10 pairs of earrings!

To use, just coat your images with Mod Podge to seal (available from my shop), and once dry glue to the cup with Diamond Glaze.  Another layer of Diamond Glaze will glue the glass to your image.  Allow the piece to dry flat for a few hours, or even better, overnight, then attach the pendant cup to the earwire and you're all set! The glass will make your images pop! Even though they are little, these earrings will be noticed.

Also available in a dangly version, both with silver plated and gold plated fittings.

You can make beautiful jewellery for presents, and the re-sell value of the finished earrings is huge!  And yet, they will cost you pence to make.  :)

Please see other listings in my shop for all the items you will need to make beautiful jewellery and accessories.  We have lots of bails, pendant blanks, Chiyogami papers, E6000 glue, Judikins Diamond Glaze and much much more!

Happy making!

name: Silver Tone Bobby Pins Hair Grips with Pad
description:
Make your own hair accessories!  These lovely little silver coloured hair grips have an 8mm pad to show off your creations.

In the shop you will find all sorts of little cabochons that fit perfectly on top of these, and the possibilities will be endless!  Or check out the resin flower cabochons in the shop, they look adorable atop the hair pins. 

They measure 4.5cm long which is about 1.7in, and the circle pad is 8mm across.

This listing is for 10 (ten) bobby pins. 

The finished pins shown in the pictures (with resin flowers) are for illustration only and not included in this sale.

name: Colourful Faux Leather Necklaces for Pendants x 10
description:
These are very very lovely!  Pretty plaits of coloured faux leather with silver tone lobster clasp and extension chain.  A beautiful way to show off your scrabble tile and glass tile pendants - these necklaces are soft and strong and will really bring the best out of your pendants.  They are made of plaited manmade leather strips which really feel like real leather! 

And no animals were hurt in the making of these necklaces!! :)

They measure 45cm long which is about 18in, and they are 3-4mm in width.

The width of the metal end measures about 5mm in diameter, however the ends can be opened (carefully!) with your jewellery pliers so that you may pop your bail/pendant through, and then the spring ends can be tightened against the cord once again for a secure fit.  

This necklace will not be suitable for the small bails available in the shop.

This listing is for 10 (ten) necklaces in a kaleidoscope of colours,  You will receive a similar mix of colours to those in the photos.

name: Colourful Voile Ribbon Necklaces for Pendants, now available in packs of 100!
description:
Pretty voile necklaces with silver tone lobster clasp and extension chain.  This is perfect to show off your scrabble tile and glass tile pendants - and will look fantastic with my pendant trays.  The necklace is made of voile ribbon and waxed cord. 

They measure 45cm long which is about 18in - and the extension chain measures an extra 2in.  The width of the metal ends is about 7x5mm, so you need to ensure it will fit your bail.

This listing is for 10 (ten) or 100 (one hundred) necklaces in a choice of individual colours or a pack containing a pretty rainbow of colours, all of which will be different though they may vary slightly from those in the pictures.  

Individual colours available (in packs of 10):

- Black
- White 
- Apple Green (light)
- Grass Green (medium)
- Orange
- Red
- Pale Pink
- Cerise Pink
- Turquoise 
- Chocolate Brown 
- Electric Blue
- Navy Blue
- Purple
- Lilac

Available in packs of 100:

- Red
- Navy
- Cerise Pink
- Baby blue
- Chocolate Brown

Please note the pendant shown in the pictures is for illustration only and is not included in this sale.

name: Your Choice of Chiyogami Paper - 10x10cm Piece or Mixed Pack
description:
Iconic handmade Japanese papers, these age-old works of art are still made in the old method - layering inks over handmade paper until the design builds up to a stunning end result.  They are therefore delicate and exclusive which makes them very coveted by artists of all persuasions.

If you already have a favourite Chiyogami paper, here you can buy a slightly bigger piece of that particular design.  Or if you can't decide, try our small mixed pack which will give you several offcuts of the various styles we offer - the pieces in the mixed pack will be small, maybe 1 or 2 inches per side but you will get a few different designs so you can see for yourself how lovely these are!

Want to see a picture of the designs in a bit more detail? Scroll to the third picture in this listing where you will find the graphic with numbers and click for a bigger view.  

The single pieces measure approximately 10x10cm, about 4x4in, though some will be slightly bigger and some will be slightly smaller (but only slightly!).  This listing is for one, five or ten 10x10cm pieces of your choice or a small sampler pack.
 
To buy, please either choose by using the number reference provided in the photos or by pinging us an email with your choices.  If you have a favourite that is not in stock, it will not show on the drop down list, but feel free to send us an email and we will see if we can restock it for you!

Please remember that Chiyogami is a handmade paper that is very porous.  If you intend to use these papers for your glass tile jewellery, you must coat the paper on all sides and even the edges with several coats of ModPodge or similar sealant, to prevent the inks from bleeding.  Each coat must dry thoroughly before applying the next one, and the same goes for the glazes - let it dry completely before gluing in place to a pendant tray etc.

name: Small Oblong Metal Gift Tin for Jewellery, Now with Optional Stickers!
description:
Beautiful matte oblong metal gift tin, measuring 60x34x11mm. Slide & click closure.

For total personalisation you can now purchase these tins with stickers to fit, for a unique, personalised gift.  To use the stickers simply peel off the paper backing and protecting film and press the sticker over your chosen image (laser printed artwork and commercial papers work best), then simply cut around your image and use ModPodge to glue it onto your tin for a long lasting professional finish.

This tin is just the right size to hold a little present that you have made yourself.  It will fit the round and square pendants (up to 25mm) we sell in our shop but not the ornate ones.  It will not fit the rectangular pendants or the cufflinks.

This little tin is available to buy individually, or buy in bigger quantities for better value!  Available alone or with matching stickers.

name: Faster Post Option - All Countries - prices from:
description:
This option is ideal if you need your items in a hurry, as they will be sent by a faster posting method. The options are as follows:

In the UK:

- Special Delivery which ensures (where possible) that you receive them on the next working day before 1pm (not Saturdays). Your items will be tracked and insured.
- Special Delivery Saturday Guarantee which ensures (where possible) that you receive them on a Saturday before 1pm if you order on a Friday. Your items will be tracked and insured.

For Europe and Rest of World:
- Your order will be sent by Airsure, International Signed For or courier at our election.  All are faster than our standard method of shipping, they will be trackable where possible and insured.

Please note we must receive your order before 12pm on Monday to Friday for it to be sent on the same day.  For a UK Saturday guaranteed delivery, please ensure we receive your order on Friday morning.  

If your order is received after 12pm, we will send it no later than the following working day. If for any reason we are unable to post as scheduled, we will make you aware of this and refund your faster postage payment.

Please note amount you pay is on top of our standard £2.50 shipping charge.

name: Slight Seconds of All Kinds, Have a Look!
description:
We like to call this our bargain shelf - lots of products that are a little past their best, but still offer huge amounts of crafting opportunities. 

All the items are fit for purpose, but please be aware that they are slight seconds, so you may find them unsuitable to make into jewellery to sell on for profit.  They may have slight bumps, dents, scratches, plating issues.  Some will be in worse condition than others, and that will be reflected in the price.  Some will need a bit of work to put them right, like some metal items where the metal has creased somewhat or a wooden item that may need a slight bit of filing.

However, with just a bit of work, and often with no work at all, we hope you will find them an absolute bargain - they are perfectly usable, which makes them ideal if you are just starting out in your craft and don't want to spend a fortune, or if you want to experiment with a new method, or perhaps you fancy making a few pieces of new jewellery for yourself and some economical presents for friends.  They are ideal for schools and for rainy-day crafting with kids!  

And remember if you really don't like them, you can always return them for a refund if you have not used them.  We will only ask you to cover the postage. 

Here you will find pendant trays, glass, and many other wonderful things - you will see what is available this week using the drop down list below.  We will keep changing the listing here as new things come in, so keep a close eye on it, some bits won't hang around for long!

This week we have:

- Pendant trays - these can be in 25mm or in a mix of sizes and colours.  They may have a slight fault with the plating, or a little bump, stain or scratch, nothing that a good polish or a deft hand with the pliers or jewellery hammer won't remove.  The packs may include a mix of various styles of 25mm trays available in the shop, or they could be all in one same style.  In terms of colour and style, we have mostly silver plated slight seconds of the lightweight tray variety, so the mixed packs are likely to contain a good number of these.

- Skinny Trays - we have a number of silver plated 50x10mm rectangular trays (hanging vertically), these can have little bumps.

- Rings - a variety of ring styles, sizes and colours, but mostly silver plated 25mm round bezels, generally suffering from having been slightly bumped in transit, or ring-to-base soldering that is slightly off-centre.

- Connectors - 14mm round trays in black with some moderate staining from the plating process. 

- Glass.  We have a mix of glass mostly with little scratches, bubbles or the odd uneven shape - you will not receive broken glass that is beyond use!  This is ideal for mosaic or projects where you may not require a flawless piece.  We will be careful to pack it well as if it were of the more expensive kind however 

- Brooches.  A number of these arrived twisted, but it is nothing that you can't repair with your pliers. 

- Bangles and bracelets.  Most of the issues with these are small scratches, uneven edges or bumps.  The acrylic bracelets are all the large silver 30x40mm ovals - they may have little scratches or slight bumps at the back.  They will be sent without stickers.

- Bails - a mix of bails but mostly in gold.

- ModPodge - either twisted labels or cases where the silver seal did not adhere all the way around the top of the bottle and a little amount of the glue has dried around the seal.  The pots are as full as an intact bottle and their quality is unaffected.

- Diamond Glaze - damaged bottles from leakage in transit.  Contents are fine.

- Mirrors - The spring is loose and so the mirrors don't stand up on their own.  However, they are still perfectly usable and just as beautiful as our full price ones.

- Hair bits - mostly golden hair pins. 

- Cufflinks - These can have stains from the plating process, or a slightly askew tray.  The great majority of these will be silver plated round 16mm cufflinks.
